original: rigs kyi dbye ba rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: rigs kyi dbye ba rnam par bsgom //
translated: of the families is through the divisions of the lords.

original: lha mo'i dbye ba  dbye ba mis //
analyzed: lha mo'i dbye ba  dbye ba mis //
translated: The division of the goddesses is the division of the humans.

original: bdag po yang ni rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: bdag po yang ni rnam par bsgom //
translated: The lord is also meditated on.

original: mig gi dbye ba'i dbye ba yis //
analyzed: mig gi dbye ba'i dbye ba yis //
translated: The division of the division of the eyes

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi sgra la sbyor //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi sgra la sbyor //
translated: is applied to the sound of the dakinis.

original: yang na sku gsum dbye gang gis //
analyzed: yang na sku gsum dbye gang gis //
translated: Or else, by the division of the three bodies,

original: de ni bdag por bya gang yin //🔽bdag la sogs dbye ba yis //
analyzed: de ni bdag por bya gang yin // bdag la sogs dbye ba yis //
translated: what is to be made the lord?

original: 'khor lo'i dbye ba'i dbye ba yin //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i dbye ba'i dbye ba yin //
translated: The division of the wheel is the division of the self and so forth.

original: rigs kyi dbye ba thams cad kyis //
analyzed: rigs kyi dbye ba thams cad kyis //
translated: By all the divisions of the families,

original: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma yis dbye //
analyzed: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma yis dbye //
translated: the heroes and yoginis are divided.

original: mngal skyes glu yi sbyor ba yis //🔽sgom pa rnams ni yongs su brtag /
analyzed: mngal skyes glu yi sbyor ba yis // sgom pa rnams ni yongs su brtag /
translated: The womb-born is imagined by the application of song.

original: sgong skyes  med pa ste //
analyzed: sgong skyes  med pa ste //
translated: The egg-born is non-existent,

original: sgra dang sgra nyams spangs pa'o //
analyzed: sgra dang sgra nyams spangs pa'o //
translated: free from sound and the loss of sound.

original: 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das //
translated: This is the self-arisen Bhagavan,

original: rnal 'byor bde ba'i mchog dam pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor bde ba'i mchog dam pa /
translated: the supreme bliss of yoga.🔽Some desire yoga,🔽some do not desire yoga,

original: kha cig gi ni rnal 'byor 'dod; kha cig rnal 'byor 'dod min te //
analyzed: kha cig gi ni rnal 'byor 'dod; kha cig rnal 'byor 'dod min te //
translated: abiding in the stage of non-entity

original: glu sgra la sogs spangs pa yi //🔽dngos po med pa'i go 'phang bzhugs //
analyzed: glu sgra la sogs spangs pa yi // dngos po med pa'i go 'phang bzhugs //
translated: free from the sound of song and so forth.

original: phra zhing mi zad dngos po med //
analyzed: phra zhing mi zad dngos po med //
translated: Subtle, imperishable, non-entity,

original: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'o; ;glu sgra la sogs bcas pa yis //
analyzed: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'o; ;glu sgra la sogs bcas pa yis //
translated: Free from the duality of subject and object.

original: go 'phang mchog gi longs spyod ni //
analyzed: go 'phang mchog gi longs spyod ni //
translated: The enjoyment of the supreme state

original: glu sgra la sogs spangs pa yi //
analyzed: glu sgra la sogs spangs pa yi //
translated: Is free from the sounds of singing and so forth.🔽The state of non-entity

original: dngos po med pa'i go 'phang bzhugs //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i go 'phang bzhugs //
translated: Resides in the supreme enjoyment.

original: phra zhing mi zad dngos po med /
analyzed: phra zhing mi zad dngos po med /
translated: Subtle, imperishable, non-entity,

original: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'o //
analyzed: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'o //
translated: Free from the duality of subject and object.

original: go 'phang mchog gi longs spyod ni //
analyzed: go 'phang mchog gi longs spyod ni //
translated: The enjoyment of the supreme state

original: glu sgra la sogs bcas pa yi //
analyzed: glu sgra la sogs bcas pa yi //
translated: Is accompanied by the sounds of singing and so forth.

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad kyang //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad kyang //
translated: All the qualities of desire

original: phan dang snying brtser bdag gis @170a *//
analyzed: phan dang snying brtser bdag gis @170a *//
translated: Are for the benefit and compassion

original: bza'; ;sems can don la brtson pa yis //
analyzed: bza'; ;sems can don la brtson pa yis //
translated: Of those striving for the benefit of sentient beings.🔽Patience and supreme effort

original: bzod pa brtson 'grus mchog dam pa //
analyzed: bzod pa brtson 'grus mchog dam pa //
translated: Are the highest yoga.

original: rnal 'byor pas glu mi smad cing //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas glu mi smad cing //
translated: The yogin should not disparage singing,

original: mkha' 'gro mas ni phan par dbyes //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro mas ni phan par dbyes //
translated: As the ḍākinīs are divided for the benefit.

original: ho; srid pa gsum na bde brnyes gtso //
analyzed: ho; srid pa gsum na bde brnyes gtso //
translated: Ho! Having attained bliss in the three existences,

original: aa la la ho //
analyzed: aa la la ho //
translated: A la la ho!

original: rgyal ba bde can greng ba'i tshogs //
analyzed: rgyal ba bde can greng ba'i tshogs //
translated: The assembly of joyful victors

original: padma la ni rdo rje rol //
analyzed: padma la ni rdo rje rol //
translated: Play with the vajra in the lotus.

original: aa la la ho //
analyzed: aa la la ho //
translated: A la la ho!

original: bde gshegs bral ba'i bzhad las grol //
analyzed: bde gshegs bral ba'i bzhad las grol //
translated: Liberated from the laughter of the bliss of the sugatas,

original: bdag po dgyes pa kun gyi bcud //
analyzed: bdag po dgyes pa kun gyi bcud //
translated: The essence of all the delighted lords,

original: chags pas rab tu dgyes mdzad cing //
analyzed: chags pas rab tu dgyes mdzad cing //
translated: Delighting in passion,

original: srid pa gsum na tshogs kyi bcud //
analyzed: srid pa gsum na tshogs kyi bcud //
translated: The essence of the assembly in the three existences.

original: aa la la ho //
analyzed: aa la la ho //
translated: A la la ho!🔽The one who is liberated by delight,

original: dgyes pas mngon par grol ba po; ;bdag ni 'dod las rang grol mdzod //
analyzed: dgyes pas mngon par grol ba po; ;bdag ni 'dod las rang grol mdzod //
translated: Liberate me from desire!

original: a'a la las ni byung ba yis //
analyzed: a'a la las ni byung ba yis //
translated: Arisen from a la la,

original: padma yi ni rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: padma yi ni rnal 'byor pas //
translated: The yogin of the lotus,

original: glu yi rgyal po 'di blangs pas //
analyzed: glu yi rgyal po 'di blangs pas //
translated: Having sung this king of songs,

original: rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bde ba ni //
analyzed: rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bde ba ni //
translated: The vajra yogin's bliss

original: padma'i dra ba las bzhengs so //
analyzed: padma'i dra ba las bzhengs so //
translated: Arises from the net of lotuses.

original: 'dis bskul bas ni mgon po rnams //
analyzed: 'dis bskul bas ni mgon po rnams //
translated: Stirred by this, the lords

original: bde chen bde phyir gzhal yas nas //
analyzed: bde chen bde phyir gzhal yas nas //
translated: From the immeasurable palace for the sake of great bliss,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad bzhengs 'khrungs te //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad bzhengs 'khrungs te //
translated: All buddhas arise and are born,

original: rgyal ba ma lus skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rgyal ba ma lus skye bar 'gyur //
translated: And all victors are born without exception.

original: glu dang bcas pa'i dngos po med //
analyzed: glu dang bcas pa'i dngos po med //
translated: There is no entity with song.

original: sgong skyes cha ni spangs pa yis //
analyzed: sgong skyes cha ni spangs pa yis //
translated: Having abandoned the part of the egg-born,

original: de yi gzugs ni ma mthong ste //
analyzed: de yi gzugs ni ma mthong ste //
translated: One does not see its form,

original: bde ba med cing sdug bsngal med //
analyzed: bde ba med cing sdug bsngal med //
translated: Neither blissful nor suffering,

original: gnyis su med cing dngos po med //
analyzed: gnyis su med cing dngos po med //
translated: Nondual and insubstantial.

original: brtag pa'i spyod yul rnam par brtag /
analyzed: brtag pa'i spyod yul rnam par brtag /
translated: The object of investigation is imagined.

original: tshes dang chos las rnam grol zhing //
analyzed: tshes dang chos las rnam grol zhing //
translated: Liberated from the lunar days and the Dharma,

original: sdig pa nyas pas mi gos so //
analyzed: sdig pa nyas pas mi gos so //
translated: he is not sullied by the slightest sin.🔽All are liberated from duality,

original: thams cad gnyis med rnam grol ba'i //🔽sgong @170b skyes dngos po dang bcas yin //
analyzed: thams cad gnyis med rnam grol ba'i // sgong @170b skyes dngos po dang bcas yin //
translated: the egg-born are substantial.

original: glus ni gnyid las sad pas na //
analyzed: glus ni gnyid las sad pas na //
translated: Awakened from sleep by song,

original: rmongs pas mkhas pa mi smad do //🔽ma rtogs pa dang rtogs bya'i phyir //
analyzed: rmongs pas mkhas pa mi smad do // ma rtogs pa dang rtogs bya'i phyir //
translated: the ignorant do not revile the wise.🔽For the sake of sentient beings,

original: sems can don du sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: sems can don du sangs rgyas so //
translated: the Buddha arose for the sake of the unrealized and the realized.

original: zhing skyes lhan cig skyes lha mo //
analyzed: zhing skyes lhan cig skyes lha mo //
translated: The field-born, the innate goddesses,

original: gnas skyes rnal 'byor ma de bzhin //
analyzed: gnas skyes rnal 'byor ma de bzhin //
translated: the place-born yoginīs,🔽the clan-born, the goddess-born,🔽the invisible sky-goers,

original: rigs skyes lha mo skyes lha mo //
analyzed: rigs skyes lha mo skyes lha mo //
translated: the supreme of the supreme births,🔽the best of the various middling,🔽the thirty on the earth,🔽the subterranean ones dwelling below,

original: mi snang mkha' spyod ma de bzhin //
analyzed: mi snang mkha' spyod ma de bzhin //
translated: the yakṣiṇīs, the singers,🔽the kinnarīs, the gandharvīs,🔽all the goddesses, the accomplished,🔽and others, the blissful ones,🔽the bodhisattvas, the great beings,🔽the buddhas, the blessed ones,🔽the pratyekabuddhas,🔽and the śrāvakas—

original: tha ma'i skye ba mchog nyid de //
analyzed: tha ma'i skye ba mchog nyid de //
translated: all these are the supreme of the supreme.🔽The middling are of various kinds.🔽The thirty are on the earth.🔽The subterranean ones dwell below.🔽The yakṣiṇīs, the singers,🔽the kinnarīs, the gandharvīs,🔽all the goddesses, the accomplished,🔽and others, the blissful ones,🔽the bodhisattvas, the great beings,🔽the buddhas, the blessed ones,🔽the pratyekabuddhas,🔽and the śrāvakas—🔽all these are the supreme of the supreme.🔽The middling are of various kinds.

original: bar ma sna tshogs dam pa yin; ;sum cu pa ni sa la spyod //
analyzed: bar ma sna tshogs dam pa yin; ;sum cu pa ni sa la spyod //
translated: The thirty are on the earth.

original: sa 'og spyod pa 'og na gnas //
analyzed: sa 'og spyod pa 'og na gnas //
translated: The subterranean ones dwell below.🔽The yakṣiṇīs, the singers,

original: gnod sbyin ma dang glu mo dang // mi 'am ci mo dri za mo //
analyzed: gnod sbyin ma dang glu mo dang // mi 'am ci mo dri za mo //
translated: the kinnarīs, the gandharvīs,🔽all the goddesses, the accomplished,🔽and others, the blissful ones,🔽the bodhisattvas, the great beings,🔽the buddhas, the blessed ones,

original: lha mo thams cad sngon grub dang // gzhan yang bde gshegs bsam pa can //
analyzed: lha mo thams cad sngon grub dang // gzhan yang bde gshegs bsam pa can //
translated: the pratyekabuddhas,🔽and the śrāvakas—🔽all these are the supreme of the supreme.🔽The middling are of various kinds.🔽The thirty are on the earth.🔽The subterranean ones dwell below.🔽The yakṣiṇīs, the singers,🔽the kinnarīs, the gandharvīs,🔽all the goddesses, the accomplished

original: dkon mchog gsum la bdag dga' ba /
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la bdag dga' ba /
translated: I delight in the Three Jewels.

original: thams cad phyi yi dkyil 'khor lo //🔽sna tshogs glu ni nyer spyad cing //
analyzed: thams cad phyi yi dkyil 'khor lo // sna tshogs glu ni nyer spyad cing //
translated: Everything is the outer maṇḍala.

original: rtag tu glu ni blang bar bya //
analyzed: rtag tu glu ni blang bar bya //
translated: One should always sing songs

original: sna tshogs ro yi bde ba yis //
analyzed: sna tshogs ro yi bde ba yis //
translated: with the enjoyment of various songs.

original: lha mo mkha' 'gro'i gtso bo mchod //
analyzed: lha mo mkha' 'gro'i gtso bo mchod //
translated: One should make offerings to the goddesses,🔽the chief of the ḍākinīs, with the bliss of various tastes.

original: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas nas //
analyzed: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas nas //
translated: Having entered the maṇḍala of air,

original: sku yi 'khor lo rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: sku yi 'khor lo rnam par bsgom //
translated: one should visualize the maṇḍala of body.🔽Having entered the maṇḍala of water, the wise one

original: mkhas pas chu la rab gnas nas; ;gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: mkhas pas chu la rab gnas nas; ;gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par bsgom //
translated: should visualize the maṇḍala of speech.

original: me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas nas //
analyzed: me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas nas //
translated: Having entered the maṇḍala of fire,

original: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bde ba che //
analyzed: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bde ba che //
translated: the maṇḍala of mind is the great bliss.

original: dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas nas //🔽dam tshig dkyil 'khor mchog dam pa //
analyzed: dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas nas // dam tshig dkyil 'khor mchog dam pa //
translated: Having entered the maṇḍala of wind,🔽the maṇḍala of the pledge is the supreme pledge.

original: ye shes dkyil 'khor de nyid ni //
analyzed: ye shes dkyil 'khor de nyid ni //
translated: The maṇḍala of gnosis is reality;

original: de las bsam zhing rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: de las bsam zhing rnam par bsgom //
translated: one should visualize it from that.

original: bha ga'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
analyzed: bha ga'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
translated: In the center of the maṇḍala of the bhaga,

original: sna tshogs padma'i rnam pa @171a *//
analyzed: sna tshogs padma'i rnam pa @171a *//
translated: one should visualize the form of a variegated lotus.

original: bsgom; ;nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
analyzed: bsgom; ;nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
translated: In the center of the maṇḍala of the sun,

original: dpa' bo gcig pu rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: dpa' bo gcig pu rnam par bsgom //
translated: one should visualize the sole hero.

original: 'khor lo padma rdo rje phreng //
analyzed: 'khor lo padma rdo rje phreng //
translated: The wheel, the lotus, the vajra, the garland,🔽The three wheels are completely turned.

original: 'khor lo gsum po yongs su bskor; ;ji ltar dam tshig mchog 'khro lo //
analyzed: 'khor lo gsum po yongs su bskor; ;ji ltar dam tshig mchog 'khro lo //
translated: Just as the wheel of supreme commitment

original: sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng gis bskor //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng gis bskor //
translated: Is surrounded by a garland of vajras,🔽So also the outer enclosure

original: yi dvags rnam pa lngas de bzhin //🔽phyi rol dkyil 'khor yongs su bskor //
analyzed: yi dvags rnam pa lngas de bzhin // phyi rol dkyil 'khor yongs su bskor //
translated: Is surrounded by five kinds of corpses.

original: phyi rol dur khrod ma rungs pa'i //
analyzed: phyi rol dur khrod ma rungs pa'i //
translated: The outer enclosure is a terrifying charnel ground,

original: sna tshogs mdog can mchog dam pa //
analyzed: sna tshogs mdog can mchog dam pa //
translated: With various colors, supreme and excellent,

original: sna tshogs shing ni nyams dga' ba //
analyzed: sna tshogs shing ni nyams dga' ba //
translated: With various trees and delightful groves.🔽There are dogs, jackals, and wolves,🔽Crows, owls, and herons,

original: khyi dang lce spyang 'jigs pa dang // bya rog 'ug pa chu skyar dang // bya rgod dang ni si bi ka /
analyzed: khyi dang lce spyang 'jigs pa dang // bya rog 'ug pa chu skyar dang // bya rgod dang ni si bi ka /
translated: Vultures and siṁghālas,

original: sreg pa'i sa yang de bzhin te //🔽keng rus gsal zhing bskyon pa dang // rag rog bsregs pa rnam par 'phyang //🔽de bzhin phyed tshig phyed ma tshig /
analyzed: sreg pa'i sa yang de bzhin te // keng rus gsal zhing bskyon pa dang // rag rog bsregs pa rnam par 'phyang // de bzhin phyed tshig phyed ma tshig /
translated: And also the ground is strewn with bones.🔽There are skeletons, skulls, and feet,🔽And also thighs, hands, heads,🔽And jackals howling,

original: mgo bo thod pa rje ngar dang // khog pa lag pa mgo bo dang // lce spyang sgra ni sgrog pa dang // sbrul ni sna tshogs dga' bar gnas //
analyzed: mgo bo thod pa rje ngar dang // khog pa lag pa mgo bo dang // lce spyang sgra ni sgrog pa dang // sbrul ni sna tshogs dga' bar gnas //
translated: And various snakes happily dwelling there.

original: seng+ge phag dang stag dang ni //🔽ra dang lug dang de bzhin te //
analyzed: seng+ge phag dang stag dang ni // ra dang lug dang de bzhin te //
translated: Lion, pig, tiger,🔽goat, sheep, and likewise,

original: glang po khyi dang bong bu glang //
analyzed: glang po khyi dang bong bu glang //
translated: elephant, dog, donkey, and camel,

original: rnga mo sna chogs bde ba'i mchog /
analyzed: rnga mo sna chogs bde ba'i mchog /
translated: are the supreme bliss of the various [consorts].🔽Various kinds of food,🔽the supreme drink of beer,🔽the supreme gathering of heroes,

original: bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang // chang gi btung ba'i mchog rnams dang // dpa' bo 'dus pa'i mchog dag dang // rnal 'byor ma ni mchog sna tshogs //
analyzed: bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang // chang gi btung ba'i mchog rnams dang // dpa' bo 'dus pa'i mchog dag dang // rnal 'byor ma ni mchog sna tshogs //
translated: and the supreme variety of yoginīs,

original: thod pa kha tv'am ga 'dzin cing //
analyzed: thod pa kha tv'am ga 'dzin cing //
translated: holding skull-cups and khaṭvāṅgas,🔽the supreme curved knives and ḍamarus,🔽the various divine drums,🔽the various supreme foods of corpses,

original: gri gug cang te'u mchog rnams dang // sna tshogs lha yi rnga dag dang // ro mchog bza' ba sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs tsumpa a'a li ka /
analyzed: gri gug cang te'u mchog rnams dang // sna tshogs lha yi rnga dag dang // ro mchog bza' ba sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs tsumpa a'a li ka /
translated: and the various cumbī and ālī,

original: ku sha le @171b mchog dam pa dag /
analyzed: ku sha le @171b mchog dam pa dag /
translated: and the supreme kuśa grass,

original: de lta bu yi dur khrod du //🔽gnod sbyin ro langs srin po la //
analyzed: de lta bu yi dur khrod du // gnod sbyin ro langs srin po la //
translated: in such a charnel ground,🔽one should offer the bali

original: gtor ma de la sbyin bya zhing //
analyzed: gtor ma de la sbyin bya zhing //
translated: to the yakṣas, vetālas, and rākṣasas.

original: he ru ka yi gzugs rnams bsgom //
analyzed: he ru ka yi gzugs rnams bsgom //
translated: One should visualize the forms of Heruka,🔽and perform the ḍamaru, vajra, and bell,

original: cang te'u rdo rje dril bu dang // sil snyan gar rnams rab tu bya //
analyzed: cang te'u rdo rje dril bu dang // sil snyan gar rnams rab tu bya //
translated: and the musical instruments and dance.

original: phyogs kyi gos can phyag rgya sbyor //
analyzed: phyogs kyi gos can phyag rgya sbyor //
translated: The one wearing the directional cloth, with the mudra of embrace,

original: h'um phat ca co'i sgra 'byin cing //
analyzed: h'um phat ca co'i sgra 'byin cing //
translated: Emitting the sound of “hum phat,”

original: zhabs g-yas brkyang ba'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: zhabs g-yas brkyang ba'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: With the posture of the right leg extended,

original: 'bar ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas su; ;kha ni dam tshig gis bkang nas //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas su; ;kha ni dam tshig gis bkang nas //
translated: Forming the blazing mudra,

original: 'di la gsang sngags rjes dran bya //
analyzed: 'di la gsang sngags rjes dran bya //
translated: One should recall the mantra

original: aom a'a aa ra li ho dza:h'um bam ho:/
analyzed: aom a'a aa ra li ho dza:h'um bam ho:/
translated: Here: Oṃ ā āralliho jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ.

original: badzra d'a ki n'i sa ma ya stvam dri shya ho //🔽'di ni gsum mam bzhi lnga ru //
analyzed: badzra d'a ki n'i sa ma ya stvam dri shya ho // 'di ni gsum mam bzhi lnga ru //
translated: Vajraḍākinīs, be present, be seen!🔽This should be recited three, four, or five times,

original: yang dang yang du brjod par bya //
analyzed: yang dang yang du brjod par bya //
translated: Again and again.

original: lugs su 'byung dang lhag pa yis //
analyzed: lugs su 'byung dang lhag pa yis //
translated: In the forward and reverse order,

original: thod par de rnams la yang sbyin //
analyzed: thod par de rnams la yang sbyin //
translated: One should also give them to the skull cups.

original: rdo rje thal mo gye na phye nas //
analyzed: rdo rje thal mo gye na phye nas //
translated: Having opened the vajra palms,

original: 'di la gsang sngags 'dab par bya //
analyzed: 'di la gsang sngags 'dab par bya //
translated: One should offer the mantra here:

original: aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
analyzed: aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
translated: Oṃ kha kha khāhi khāhi.

original: sarba yaksha raksha sa bh'u ta pre ta pi sh'a tsa aun m'a da aa pasm'a ra d'a ka d'a ki n+y'a da ya /

original: dbang bskur yang ni dbul bar bya //
analyzed: dbang bskur yang ni dbul bar bya //
translated: Is also offered in the empowerment.🔽Then, one should don the armor. The wise one should recite the wisdom

original: de nas go cha dgod bya ste; ;mkhas pas ye shes bzlas ba ni //
analyzed: de nas go cha dgod bya ste; ;mkhas pas ye shes bzlas ba ni //
translated: mantra,

original: srog rtsol bsngams te legs bzlas pa //
analyzed: srog rtsol bsngams te legs bzlas pa //
translated: Having bound the life-force and exertion,

original: sgom pa'i bsgoms pas gsang bar bya //
analyzed: sgom pa'i bsgoms pas gsang bar bya //
translated: One should meditate on the secret recitation.

original: aom a'a:mam h'um/ spro bsdu dag gi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: aom a'a:mam h'um/ spro bsdu dag gi sbyor ba yis //
translated: Through the yoga of emanating and reabsorbing,

original: gnyis med phreng pa'i sngags kyang bzla //
analyzed: gnyis med phreng pa'i sngags kyang bzla //
translated: recite the mantra of the nondual garland.

original: de nas dam tshig sems dpa' ni /
analyzed: de nas dam tshig sems dpa' ni /
translated: Then, the pledge beings

original: cho ga bzhin du bzla bar bya //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin du bzla bar bya //
translated: should be recited according to the rite.

original: aom shr'i mnydzu bdzra dhri ka a'a:ham h'um phad/🔽d'a ki n'i dz'a la sam ba ram h'um phad sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i mnydzu bdzra dhri ka a'a:ham h'um phad/ d'a ki n'i dz'a la sam ba ram h'um phad sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ śrīmañjuvajra dhrīka āḥ haṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Ḍākinī jālāṃbarā hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom badzra b'a r'a hi hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom badzra b'a r'a hi hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ vajravārāhī hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom ka ra ka ra khanda ka p'a li hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ka ra ka ra khanda ka p'a li hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ kara kara khaṇḍakapālī hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom pra tsanda hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom pra tsanda hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ pracaṇḍā hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom ku ru ku ru ma h'a kam k'a la hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ku ru ku ru ma h'a kam k'a la hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ kuru kuru mahākālikā hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom tsand'a ksh'i ye hum h'um phat/🔽aom bandha kam k'a la hum h'um phat; aom pra bha ba t'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom tsand'a ksh'i ye hum h'um phat/ aom bandha kam k'a la hum h'um phat; aom pra bha ba t'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ caṇḍākṣīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ bandha kālikā hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ. Oṃ prabhāvatīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya bi ka ta dam shti ni hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya bi ka ta dam shti ni hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ trāsaya trāsaya vikata daṃṣṭrīṇi hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom ma h'a n'a se hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ma h'a n'a se hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ mahānāsī hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom ksho bha ya ksho bha ya su ra bee ri ni hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ksho bha ya ksho bha ya su ra bee ri ni hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ kṣobhaya kṣobhaya surāvarīṇi hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom b'i ra ma t'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom b'i ra ma t'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ virāmatīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom hroom hroom aa mi t'a bh'a hum h'um phat/🔽aom kharba r'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom hroom hroom aa mi t'a bh'a hum h'um phat/ aom kharba r'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ amitābha hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ khavārīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom hra hra badzra pra bha hum h'um phat/🔽aom lang+ke shva ri ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom hra hra badzra pra bha hum h'um phat/ aom lang+ke shva ri ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ hrāṃ hrāṃ vajra prabha hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ laṅkeśvarīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom phem phem badzra de ha hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom phem phem badzra de ha hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ pheṃ pheṃ vajra deha hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom dru matstsh'a ye hum h'um phat/🔽aom phat @177a *//
analyzed: aom dru matstsh'a ye hum h'um phat/ aom phat @177a *//
translated: Oṃ dhumacchāye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: phat aang+ku ri ka hum h'um phat/
analyzed: phat aang+ku ri ka hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ phaṭ phaṭ aṅkurīka hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom aee r'a ba t'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom aee r'a ba t'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ ekarāvaṭīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom da ha da ha badzra ti la hum h'um phat/🔽aom ma h'a b'ee ra bi hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom da ha da ha badzra ti la hum h'um phat/ aom ma h'a b'ee ra bi hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ daṃ daṃ vajra tilaka hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ mahāvairocani hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ pacā pacā mahāvaira hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom pa tsa pa tsa mah'a b'i ra hum h'um phat; aom b'a yu be ge hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom pa tsa pa tsa mah'a b'i ra hum h'um phat; aom b'a yu be ge hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ āyurvege hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom bhaksha bhaksha badzra h'um k'a ra ba sam ru dhi ra aantra m'am l'am ba li ni hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom bhaksha bhaksha badzra h'um k'a ra ba sam ru dhi ra aantra m'am l'am ba li ni hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ bhakṣa bhakṣa vajra hūṃkāravaṃ samrudhiraṃtantrāmalaṃvalinī hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom su ra bhaksh'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom su ra bhaksh'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ surābhaksīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom grihna grihna su bha dra sapta p'a t'a la ga ta bhu dzi ga sarbam b'a ta rdza ya ta rdza ya hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom grihna grihna su bha dra sapta p'a t'a la ga ta bhu dzi ga sarbam b'a ta rdza ya ta rdza ya hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ, seize, seize, Subhadra, the one with seven heads and seven bodies, crush all the demons, crush them, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom shy'a ma de b'i hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom shy'a ma de b'i hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ, Śyāmadeva, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom a'a kaddhya a'a kaddhya badra bha dra hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom a'a kaddhya a'a kaddhya badra bha dra hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ, draw, draw, Dṛḍhabhadra, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom sum bha dro hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom sum bha dro hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ, Subhadra, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom hri'm hri'm ma h'a bhee ra pa hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom hri'm hri'm ma h'a bhee ra pa hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ, hrīṃ hrīṃ, Mahābhairava, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom ha ya ka rnna hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ha ya ka rnna hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ, Hayakaraṇa, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom jnoom jnoom bi ru b'aksha hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom jnoom jnoom bi ru b'aksha hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ, jhūṃ jhūṃ, Virūpākṣa, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom kha g'a na na hum h'um phat/🔽aom kshm'am kashm'am ma h'a pa le hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom kha g'a na na hum h'um phat/ aom kshm'am kashm'am ma h'a pa le hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ, Khaganana, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ, kṣmaṃ kṣmaṃ, Mahāprabhā, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom tsa kra be ge hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom tsa kra be ge hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ, Cakravartin, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom ham ham ratna badzra hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ham ham ratna badzra hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ, haṃ haṃ, Ratnavajra, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ, Khaṇḍarohā, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom khanda ro he hum h'um phat; aom hr'im hr'im ha ya gr'i ba hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom khanda ro he hum h'um phat; aom hr'im hr'im ha ya gr'i ba hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ, hrīṃ hrīṃ, Hayagrīva, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom shondi n'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom shondi n'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ, Śonitanīvāsinī, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom hum h'um a'a k'a sha garbha hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom hum h'um a'a k'a sha garbha hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ, hūṃ hūṃ, Ākāśagarbha, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom tsa kra pa rmi n'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom tsa kra pa rmi n'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ cakravarmiṇiye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom ki li ki li he ru ka hum h'um phat/🔽aom su bi re hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ki li ki li he ru ka hum h'um phat/ aom su bi re hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ kiṃ kiṃ heruka hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ subire hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom si li si li padma narte shva ri hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom si li si li padma narte shva ri hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ sili sili padmanarteśvari hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom ma h'a ba le hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ma h'a ba le hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ mahāvale hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom hi li bee ro tsa n'i hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom hi li bee ro tsa n'i hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ hilī vairocanī hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom tsakra ba rtti n'i ye hum h'um phat /
analyzed: aom tsakra ba rtti n'i ye hum h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ cakravartiṇīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom dhi li dhi li badzra satva hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom dhi li dhi li badzra satva hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ dhili dhili vajrasattva hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom mah'a b'i rye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom mah'a b'i rye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ mahāvairye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: dung chen phreng ba blangs nas ni //
analyzed: dung chen phreng ba blangs nas ni //
translated: Taking up the garland of great conches,

original: gsang sngags cho ga bzhin du bzla //
analyzed: gsang sngags cho ga bzhin du bzla //
translated: recite the mantra according to the ritual.

original: dus bzhir sbyor ba byas nas ni //
analyzed: dus bzhir sbyor ba byas nas ni //
translated: Having applied the four times,

original: bzlas dang sgom pa rtse @177b gcig bya //
analyzed: bzlas dang sgom pa rtse @177b gcig bya //
translated: practice recitation and meditation one-pointedly.

original: rnal 'byor myur du grub nas ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor myur du grub nas ni //
translated: Having quickly accomplished the yoga,

original: gsang sngags grub pa'i rim pa yis //
analyzed: gsang sngags grub pa'i rim pa yis //
translated: by the stage of accomplishing the mantra,

original: bdag nyid phyag rgyar ldan byas nas //
analyzed: bdag nyid phyag rgyar ldan byas nas //
translated: the mantrin, having made oneself endowed with the seal,

original: sngags pas rtag tu mchod par bya //
analyzed: sngags pas rtag tu mchod par bya //
translated: should always make offerings.

original: sngags pas dkyil 'khor zhugs nas ni //
analyzed: sngags pas dkyil 'khor zhugs nas ni //
translated: The mantrin, having entered the maṇḍala,

original: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom //
translated: One should meditate on the maṇḍala of body, speech, and mind.

original: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
translated: Through the yoga of one’s deity,

original: dkyil 'khor mchog ni 'grub pa yin //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor mchog ni 'grub pa yin //
translated: the supreme maṇḍala is accomplished.

original: dkyil 'khor lha yi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor lha yi sbyor ba yis //
translated: Through the yoga of the maṇḍala deity,

original: dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol //🔽mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i yang bla ma las /
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol // mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i yang bla ma las /
translated: all powers are granted.🔽This concludes the chapter on the procedure of the maṇḍala of the three wheels, the tenth in the Tantra of the Supreme Original Buddha, the Tantra of the Great Wheel of the 25,000.

original: 'khor lo gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim pa ste le'u bcu pa'o ////
analyzed: 'khor lo gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim pa ste le'u bcu pa'o ////
translated: The Chapter on the Families

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, I will explain

original: rigs kyi dbye ba'i mchog dam pa //🔽gnas sogs spyor ba'i rim pa yis //
analyzed: rigs kyi dbye ba'i mchog dam pa // gnas sogs spyor ba'i rim pa yis //
translated: the supreme division of the families,🔽through the stages of the conduct in the sacred sites,

original: phyogs kyi rim pa rnam par dbye //
analyzed: phyogs kyi rim pa rnam par dbye //
translated: the division of the directions.

original: thams cad mchog gi sbyor chen po //
analyzed: thams cad mchog gi sbyor chen po //
translated: The great union of all the supreme

original: rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab tu 'grub //🔽rdo rje sku las nges 'byung ba //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab tu 'grub // rdo rje sku las nges 'byung ba //
translated: is accomplished by the lord of yogins.

original: dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor dam pa'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor dam pa'o //
translated: The supreme maṇḍala arises from the vajra body.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / yang dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor ma thams cad 'dus shing 'ongs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dang // mig yangs dga' bas gar byed cing //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / yang dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor ma thams cad 'dus shing 'ongs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dang // mig yangs dga' bas gar byed cing //
translated: with wide eyes, dancing with joy,

original: myur bas bsdus pa'i rim pa yis //
analyzed: myur bas bsdus pa'i rim pa yis //
translated: with a swift embrace,

original: rkang pa g-yas dang g-yon gyis ni //
analyzed: rkang pa g-yas dang g-yon gyis ni //
translated: with the right and left feet,

original: mdun @178a *// du gom stabs spros pa yis //
analyzed: mdun @178a *// du gom stabs spros pa yis //
translated: with a forward step, with a playful gait,

original: 'di ltar rnam bsgyur 'khros pa'i spyan //
analyzed: 'di ltar rnam bsgyur 'khros pa'i spyan //
translated: with such a transformation, with wrathful eyes,

original: smin ma 'degs dang 'khor bar ldan //
analyzed: smin ma 'degs dang 'khor bar ldan //
translated: with eyebrows raised and rolling,

original: skye med phyag rgyar 'gro ba dag /
analyzed: skye med phyag rgyar 'gro ba dag /
translated: with the mudra of non-arising,

original: mig gi phyag rgyas phyag 'tshal te //
analyzed: mig gi phyag rgyas phyag 'tshal te //
translated: with the eye mudra, I pay homage.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' chen po la rnam pa du mas bskul nas zhus te rnal 'byor ma chen mo thams cad dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa; bcom ldan 'das kyi de nyid dang // dkyil 'khor mchog ni mdzes pa ste //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' chen po la rnam pa du mas bskul nas zhus te rnal 'byor ma chen mo thams cad dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa; bcom ldan 'das kyi de nyid dang // dkyil 'khor mchog ni mdzes pa ste //
translated: Having thus implored and requested the Great Vajrasattva in many ways, he spoke of the mandala that delights all the great yoginis: The reality of the Blessed One, the supreme and beautiful mandala,

original: dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje ni //
analyzed: dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje ni //
translated: The vajra of great delight

original: thams cad sangs rgyas bde ba che //
analyzed: thams cad sangs rgyas bde ba che //
translated: is the bliss of all buddhas.

original: rol pa'i bde ba chen po ni //
analyzed: rol pa'i bde ba chen po ni //
translated: The great bliss of play

original: de ring du ni bdag gis rnyed //
analyzed: de ring du ni bdag gis rnyed //
translated: I have found today.

original: aa la la ho //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
analyzed: aa la la ho // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
translated: A la la ho!🔽The supreme delight of great bliss

original: bde ba chen po mchog tu dgyes //
analyzed: bde ba chen po mchog tu dgyes //
translated: of all tathāgatas

original: glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis //
analyzed: glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis //
translated: is this song that is sung.

original: shin tu srid pa nges ldog pa //
analyzed: shin tu srid pa nges ldog pa //
translated: The one who has turned away from existence

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dag pa che //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dag pa che //
translated: is the pure tathāgata

original: dkyil 'khor du ni rnam par brtag /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du ni rnam par brtag /
translated: imagined in the maṇḍala.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dgongs shing spyan rnam par phye ste 'khor bzhi rnam par 'khor ba'i gar gyis smin ma 'degs shing /🔽mdun du gzigs shing gom stabs kyis //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dgongs shing spyan rnam par phye ste 'khor bzhi rnam par 'khor ba'i gar gyis smin ma 'degs shing / mdun du gzigs shing gom stabs kyis //
translated: Then the blessed one, great bliss Vajrasattva, with his mind intent and his eyes open, looked at the four retinues with a dance of the gaze that raised his eyebrows.🔽With a gait that looks ahead,

original: dregs pas snyems par rnam 'khor ba'i //
analyzed: dregs pas snyems par rnam 'khor ba'i //
translated: he circles with the pride of arrogance.

original: sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje rang //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje rang //
translated: The nature of body, speech, and mind is vajra.

original: de nyid 'di la bzhugs pa yin //
analyzed: de nyid 'di la bzhugs pa yin //
translated: He himself resides in this maṇḍala.

original: dkyil 'khor dang ni dkyil 'khor ming //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dang ni dkyil 'khor ming //
translated: The maṇḍala and the name of the maṇḍala

original: rdo rje ye shes thugs la gnas //
analyzed: rdo rje ye shes thugs la gnas //
translated: The vajra gnosis abides in the mind.

original: rtogs @178b med par bdag sbyor ba //🔽rdo rje dkyilk 'khor mchog yin no //
analyzed: rtogs @178b med par bdag sbyor ba // rdo rje dkyilk 'khor mchog yin no //
translated: One should apply oneself to the nonconceptual.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog yin no //
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog yin no //
translated: The supreme maṇḍala of the vajra is the supreme maṇḍala of the moon.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang pa ni /
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang pa ni /
translated: The full maṇḍala of the moon

original: dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje 'o //
analyzed: dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje 'o //
translated: is the vajra of great delight.

original: ri mo mkhan gyis dkar po ltar //
analyzed: ri mo mkhan gyis dkar po ltar //
translated: Like a painter with white,

original: bang chub sems mchog d'i lta bu //
analyzed: bang chub sems mchog d'i lta bu //
translated: the supreme bodhicitta is like that.

original: sngo zhing 'bar ba sna tshogs pa'i /
analyzed: sngo zhing 'bar ba sna tshogs pa'i /
translated: Blue and blazing in various ways,

original: /rlung gis bskyod pa'i me lta bu //
analyzed: /rlung gis bskyod pa'i me lta bu //
translated: like a fire stirred by the wind,

original: zla ba phyed pas bdag nyid mdzes //
analyzed: zla ba phyed pas bdag nyid mdzes //
translated: adorned with a half-moon,

original: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dag la bzhugs //
analyzed: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dag la bzhugs //
translated: residing in the maṇḍala of the vajra,

original: cha brgyad dkyil 'khor yid 'ong ba //
analyzed: cha brgyad dkyil 'khor yid 'ong ba //
translated: the beautiful maṇḍala of eight parts,

analyzed: ji lta'i gnas su rnam par dgod //

analyzed: he ru ka ni rnam par bsgom //

original: sngar bshad sku mdog gnas rnams dang // phag mo'i bde la rnam par gnas; ;shar du pu li ra ma la yar thod pa'i dum bu dang / rab gtum ma'o //

analyzed: byang du dza landha rar keng rus chen po dang / rab gtum ma'i mig can ma'o //

analyzed: nub tu m'a l'a ba na rdo rje'i sku dang / shing grib ma'o //

analyzed: shar du tri sha ku nan dpa' bo chen po dang // rlung gi shugs can ma'o //

analyzed: byang du ko sa la na rdo rje h'um mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma'o //

original: zhal gsum pa /

original: skra grol ba /

analyzed: snyoms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga ste //

original: lnga po lnga pa'i bdag nyid sbyor chen po //
analyzed: lnga po lnga pa'i bdag nyid sbyor chen po //

original: sdom pa'i cho ga sbas pa gsang ba ste //
analyzed: sdom pa'i cho ga sbas pa gsang ba ste //

original: mkha' 'grom ni ma lus thams cad kyi //
analyzed: mkha' 'grom ni ma lus thams cad kyi //

original: 'di ltar gzhan du bka' yi phyogs bzhin du //
analyzed: 'di ltar gzhan du bka' yi phyogs bzhin du //

analyzed: bum ba sna tshogs cho ga bzhin //

analyzed: gser dang dngul las byas pa ste //

original: sna tshogs gos kyis mdzes pa dang // me tog phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: sna tshogs gos kyis mdzes pa dang // me tog phreng bas rnam par brgyan //

original: 'chi med lnga yis yongs su bkang //
analyzed: 'chi med lnga yis yongs su bkang //

original: rnam lnga sman dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: rnam lnga sman dang yang dag ldan //

analyzed: rin chen lnga dang bcas pa dang // 'bru lnga dag gis rnam par mdzes //

analyzed: bum pa bcu drug bzhag nas kyang //

analyzed: glu dang gar dang bde ba che //

analyzed: phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba //

analyzed: dkyil 'khor phyi rol yongs su bskor // de yi phyi rol mu khyud kyi //

analyzed: dbus su mkha' 'gro ma yin te //

original: phyi rol ska rags kyis bskor ba //
analyzed: phyi rol ska rags kyis bskor ba //

analyzed: dur khrod rnam par 'jigs pa @181b dag /

original: sna tshogs du mas rnam par mdzes //
analyzed: sna tshogs du mas rnam par mdzes //

analyzed: mdun du ye shes dam tshig gi / dkyil 'khro mchog ni mthong nas kyang //

analyzed: mngon brjod dam tshig de bzhin mchod //

original: rim pa bzhi du dbang yang bskur //🔽mkhas pas lus la bkod nas ni //
analyzed: rim pa bzhi du dbang yang bskur // mkhas pas lus la bkod nas ni //

analyzed: gcig tu bsdus te thim nas su //

analyzed: dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma //

analyzed: phung po khams dang skye mched gnas //

analyzed: go cha gnyis po bgo bar bya //

original: 'khro lo thams cad rnam bsgoms nas //
analyzed: 'khro lo thams cad rnam bsgoms nas //

analyzed: phung po khams dang skye mched dang // lus ngang yid la rnam par dgod //

analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' snying la dgod // sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba yi //

analyzed: dam tshig lha yi mchod pas mchod //

analyzed: ye shes bzlas pa'i bya ba dag /

original: rangs med pa ni rnam bar spros //
analyzed: rangs med pa ni rnam bar spros //
translated: Should be emanated without satiation.🔽Having taken up the great conch rosary,

original: dung chen phreng ba blangs nas su; ;mnyam par bzhag nas bzlas pa bya //🔽der ni ye shes 'khor lo la //
analyzed: dung chen phreng ba blangs nas su; ;mnyam par bzhag nas bzlas pa bya // der ni ye shes 'khor lo la //

original: mkhas pas mchod bstod bzlas pa bya //
analyzed: mkhas pas mchod bstod bzlas pa bya //

original: sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir //🔽rnal 'byor pa yis smon lam gdab //
analyzed: sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir // rnal 'byor pa yis smon lam gdab //

original: theg pa chen po'i chos rnams ni //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i chos rnams ni //

original: rnal 'byor pa yis myur bar 'grub //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yis myur bar 'grub //

original: aom badzra he he ru ru kam shr'i d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ram h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom badzra he he ru ru kam shr'i d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ram h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /

original: aom hr'i: ha ha h'um h'um phat/
analyzed: aom hr'i: ha ha h'um h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ ha ha hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: snying po dang nye ba'i snying pa'o //
analyzed: snying po dang nye ba'i snying pa'o //
translated: The essence and the close essence.

original: aom badzra pee ro tsa n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom badzra pee ro tsa n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ vajra-varṇa-nīsye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra barna n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra barna n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /

original: lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying @182a *//
analyzed: lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying @182a *//

original: po'o; ;aom khanda ka p'a li ka ra ka ra hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: po'o; ;aom khanda ka p'a li ka ra ka ra hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ khaṇḍakapālī kara kara hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom pra tsande hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom pra tsande hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ pracaṇḍe hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom ma h'a kam k'a la ku ru ku ru hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom tsanda kshi me hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom ma h'a kam k'a la ku ru ku ru hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom tsanda kshi me hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ mahā-kaṃkāla kuru kuru hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ caṇḍakṣīme hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom kam k'a la bandha banddha hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom kam k'a la bandha banddha hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ kaṃkāla-bandha bandha hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom pra bh'a ba t'i ya hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom pra bh'a ba t'i ya hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ prabhāvatīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom bi ka ta dam shti na tra sa ya tra sa ya hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom bi ka ta dam shti na tra sa ya tra sa ya hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ vikatadaṃṣṭrī naya naya hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom ma h'a n'a se hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom ma h'a n'a se hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ mahānāse hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom su ru b'i ri n'i ksho bha ma ksho bha ya sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom su ru b'i ri n'i ksho bha ma ksho bha ya sv'ah'a /

original: aom b'i ra ma t'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom b'i ra ma t'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ viryamatiye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom aa mi t'a bha hroom h'oom hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom kharba ri ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom aa mi t'a bha hroom h'oom hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom kharba ri ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ amitābha hreṃ hreṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ kṣetrapatiye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom badzra phra bh'a hra hra hu h'u phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom lam ke shva r'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom badzra phra bh'a hra hra hu h'u phat sv'ah'a / aom lam ke shva r'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ vajraprabha hreṃ hreṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ laṅkeśvarīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom badzra de ha pheem pheem hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom badzra de ha pheem pheem hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ vajradeha pheṃ pheṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom badzra dru matstsha ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom badzra dru matstsha ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ vajradrumacchāyīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom aam ku ri ka phat hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom aam ku ri ka phat hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ aṅkurīka phaṭ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom aee ra ba t'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom aee ra ba t'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ airāvatīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom badzra dza ti la da ha da ha hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom ma h'a bhe ra p'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom badzra dza ti la da ha da ha hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom ma h'a bhe ra p'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ vajrajāti laṃ laṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ mahābhairavapāyīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom ma h'a b'i ra pa tsa pa tsa hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom ma h'a b'i ra pa tsa pa tsa hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /

original: aom b'a yu be ge hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom b'a yu be ge hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ vāyuvegīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom badzra h'um k'a ra bhaksha bhaksha ba sa ru dhi ra aanta m'a l'a ba lam pi ni hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom badzra h'um k'a ra bhaksha bhaksha ba sa ru dhi ra aanta m'a l'a ba lam pi ni hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ vajra hūṃkāra bhakṣa bhakṣa vasu rudhira anta mālava lambini hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom su ra bhaksh'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom su ra bhaksh'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ suryabhakṣiye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom su bha dra grihna grihna sapta p'a t'a la ga ta bhu dzam ga sarbam b'a tardzdza ya t'ardzdza ya hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom su bha dra grihna grihna sapta p'a t'a la ga ta bhu dzam ga sarbam b'a tardzdza ya t'ardzdza ya hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /

original: aom sh+y'a ma de b'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom sh+y'a ma de b'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ śyāmadeviye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom badzra bha dra a'a kaddhya aa kaddhya hum h'um phat sv'h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra bha dra a'a kaddhya aa kaddhya hum h'um phat sv'h'a /
translated: Oṃ vajra bhadra adhi adhi hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom su bha dre hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom su bha dre hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ subhadrī hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom h'a bhee ra ba hrim hrim hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom h'a bhee ra ba hrim hrim hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ hā bhairava hriṃ hriṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom ha ya karne hum h'um @182b phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom ha ya karne hum h'um @182b phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ hayakarṇi hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom bi r'u p'akshi dznoom dznoom hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom bi r'u p'akshi dznoom dznoom hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ virūpākṣi joṃ joṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom kha g'a na ne hum h'um phat svh'ah'a /
analyzed: aom kha g'a na ne hum h'um phat svh'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ khaṅgaṇe hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom ma h'a pa la kshm'am kshm'am hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom ma h'a pa la kshm'am kshm'am hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ mahāpala kṣaṃ kṣaṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom tsakra be ke hum h'um nga ta sv'ah'a /🔽aom ratna badzra ham ham hram h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom khanda ngo he hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom ha ya gr'i ba hr'im hr'im hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom she ndi n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom aa k'a sha garbha b'um h'um h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom tsa kra wa rmi n'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom he ru ka ki li ki li hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom su b'i re h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom padma narte shva ra si li si li hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom ma h'a ba la hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom bee ro tsa na hi li hi lio hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom tsakra warte ni ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom tsakra be ke hum h'um nga ta sv'ah'a / aom ratna badzra ham ham hram h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom khanda ngo he hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom ha ya gr'i ba hr'im hr'im hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom she ndi n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom aa k'a sha garbha b'um h'um h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom tsa kra wa rmi n'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom he ru ka ki li ki li hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom su b'i re h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom padma narte shva ra si li si li hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom ma h'a ba la hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom bee ro tsa na hi li hi lio hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom tsakra warte ni ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ cakravarmi hūṃ hūṃ ṭaṃ svāhā.🔽Oṃ ratnavajra haṃ haṃ hram hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ khaḍgaṅgī hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ hayagrīva hriṃ hriṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ śāntidevīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ ākāśagarbha vauṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ cakravartinīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ herukakiṃkiṇi kiṃkiṇi hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ subhadra hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ padmanarteśvara sili sili hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ mahābala hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ vairocana hilī hilī hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ cakravartinīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽

original: aom badzra satva dhi li dhi li hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom badzra satva dhi li dhi li hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ vajra-sattva dhili dhili hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽

original: aom ma h'a b'ir+ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom d'a k'i n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a aom l'a me hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom khanda ro he hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom r'u pi n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom k'a k'a sye hum h'um sv'ah'a /🔽aom au l'u k'a sye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom shva n'a sye h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom s'u ka r'a sye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom ya ma d'a dh'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom ma h'a b'ir+ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom d'a k'i n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a aom l'a me hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom khanda ro he hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom r'u pi n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom k'a k'a sye hum h'um sv'ah'a / aom au l'u k'a sye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom shva n'a sye h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom s'u ka r'a sye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom ya ma d'a dh'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ mahāvirye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ dākinīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā. Oṃ lāmāye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ khaṇḍarohīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ rūpiṇīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ kākasye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ ulukaśye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ śvānāsyāye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ sūkarāsyāye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ yamādādhye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽

original: gnyis pa m'a la ba na shing grib ma'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa m'a la ba na shing grib ma'o //
translated: in the second, Mālava, Vṛkṣā;

original: gsum pa k'a ma ru pa na sa srung ma'o //
analyzed: gsum pa k'a ma ru pa na sa srung ma'o //
translated: in the third, Kāmarūpa, Kṣemalā;🔽in the fourth, Oḍiyāna, Caṇḍālī;🔽in the fifth, Koṅkaṇa, Caṇḍikā;🔽in the sixth, Kāñci, Caṇḍikā.

original: bzhi pa ao dre na 'jigs byed ma'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa ao dre na 'jigs byed ma'o //

original: lnga pa tri sha ku ni na rlung gi shugs can ma'o //
analyzed: lnga pa tri sha ku ni na rlung gi shugs can ma'o //

original: drug pa ko sa la na @185a *//🔽chang 'thung ma'o //
analyzed: drug pa ko sa la na @185a *// chang 'thung ma'o //
translated: Sixth, in Kosala, is Surābhakṣi.🔽Third, in Kāmarūpa, is Mahānāsā.🔽Fourth, in Kāmarūpa, is Mahābhairavā.🔽Fifth, in Kāmarūpa, is Mahālakṣmī.🔽Sixth, in Kāmarūpa, is Mahābalā.

original: nub kyi 'khor lo gsum pa'i rtsibs drug gi shar du ka lingka na sngo bsangs lha mo'o //
analyzed: nub kyi 'khor lo gsum pa'i rtsibs drug gi shar du ka lingka na sngo bsangs lha mo'o //
translated: In the east of the six spokes of the third wheel in the west, in Kaliṅga, is Śyāmādevī.

original: gnyis pa lam pa ka na rab bzang ma'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa lam pa ka na rab bzang ma'o //
translated: Second, in Lampāka, is Subhadrā.

original: gsum pa k'am tsi na rta rna ma'o bzhi pa hi ma la yan bya gdong ma'o //
analyzed: gsum pa k'am tsi na rta rna ma'o bzhi pa hi ma la yan bya gdong ma'o //
translated: Third, in Kāñcī, is Hayakarṇī. Fourth, in Himālaya, is Suvarṇākṣī.

original: lnga pa pre ta pu rin 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o //
analyzed: lnga pa pre ta pu rin 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o //
translated: Fifth, in Pretapuri, is Cakravīryā.

original: drug pa gri ha de ba t'a na du ma skyes ma'o //
analyzed: drug pa gri ha de ba t'a na du ma skyes ma'o //
translated: Sixth, in Triśakuni, is Anāthapiṇḍitā.

analyzed: lho'i 'khor lo bzhi pa'i rtsibs drug gi shar la see r'ashta na chang tshang ma'o //
translated: In the east of the six spokes of the fourth wheel in the south, in Serṣaṭa, is Mahāśvetā.

original: gnyis pa na su barna dvi pa na 'khro lo'i go cha ma'o /
analyzed: gnyis pa na su barna dvi pa na 'khro lo'i go cha ma'o /

original: gsum pa na rab tu dpa' mo'o //
analyzed: gsum pa na rab tu dpa' mo'o //

original: bzhi pa sindh'un stobs chen ma'o //

original: lnga pa ma ru ta na 'khro los bsgyur ma'o //
analyzed: lnga pa ma ru ta na 'khro los bsgyur ma'o //

translated: The skin and dirt are

original: 'od ldan ma'o //
analyzed: 'od ldan ma'o //

analyzed: 'du shes kyi phung po ni /

analyzed: rdo rje shr'i he ru ka'o //

analyzed: dbang phyug rdo rje /

original: lus ni / snang mdzad rdo rje /

analyzed: 'di dag dgod par bya ba ni; ye shes 'khor lo mthong ba yin //

analyzed: sbyor ba 'di la gnas na ni //

analyzed: de yis thams cad bsgoms par 'gyur //

analyzed: dbang bskur mchod dang dam tshig dang // sgom pa mnyam pa bcud du byed //

analyzed: de snying ye shes sems dpa' la //

analyzed: lus ngag yid kyi dam tshig rnams //

analyzed: sems dang sems min legs par brtag /

analyzed: bzlas dang sgam pa'i sbyor ba yis //

analyzed: rnam rtog thams cad spangs nas ni //

analyzed: dam tshig mchog gi bzlas pa yis //

analyzed: gsang sngags rgyal po mchog kyang 'grub //

analyzed: aom bee ro tsa n'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /

analyzed: aom sarba puddha d'a k'i n'i ye badzra barna n'i  hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /

analyzed: bstod dang ming du yang dag sbyar //

analyzed: h'um h'um phat dang ldan pa yi // rab gtum ma sogs gsang @188a *//

analyzed: sngags dag / sbyar nas mchog gi bzlas pa bya //

analyzed: bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs nas ni //

analyzed: zhi ba'i btung ba mchog kyang btung //

original: chos rnams thams cad yongs mnyam pa'i //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad yongs mnyam pa'i //

original: mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog yin te //
analyzed: mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog yin te //

original: de bas de bsgom rnam par dag /
analyzed: de bas de bsgom rnam par dag /

analyzed: sum cu bdun pa'i go 'phang mchog /

analyzed: bdag med chos dang lam dang ni; ;dkyil 'khor mchog la rab tu bzhugs //

analyzed: shes rab pha rol rnal 'byor ma //

original: rnal 'byor las ni ngal bsos nas //
analyzed: rnal 'byor las ni ngal bsos nas //

original: mtshan med go 'phang gnas nas su //
analyzed: mtshan med go 'phang gnas nas su //

analyzed: mtshan med la ni mnyam par brten // chos rnams med cing mtshan ma med //

original: chos min chos can dag kyang med //
analyzed: chos min chos can dag kyang med //

original: rten 'brel chos kyang mkha' dang mnyam //
analyzed: rten 'brel chos kyang mkha' dang mnyam //

original: dngos po med cing mtshan ma med //
analyzed: dngos po med cing mtshan ma med //

original: de nyid bzhi la 'dir gnas na //
analyzed: de nyid bzhi la 'dir gnas na //

analyzed: ye shes mig gis mthong ba yin // gnas sogs 'khor lo nges par yang //

original: nyi zer rdul dang mnyam par mthong //
analyzed: nyi zer rdul dang mnyam par mthong //

original: skra yi rtse mo 'bum bshags pa'i //
analyzed: skra yi rtse mo 'bum bshags pa'i //

analyzed: cha yang yongs su rtogs shing mthong // bha ga'i dbus na bzhugs pa yis //

analyzed: he ru rnal 'byor ma lhan cig /

analyzed: 'khor los bsgyur ba rab sbyor ba; ;khva gdong la sogs phyi rol dgod //

original: he ru ka dpal bdag po ni //
analyzed: he ru ka dpal bdag po ni //

original: mkha' 'gro bzhi yis yongs su bskor //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro bzhi yis yongs su bskor //

original: phan tshun bdag pos bya ba ni //
analyzed: phan tshun bdag pos bya ba ni //

original: rdo rje sems sogs @188b sbyor ba ni //
analyzed: rdo rje sems sogs @188b sbyor ba ni //

original: rnal 'byor ma dang thun mong 'grub //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma dang thun mong 'grub //

original: sbyor ba gsum ni dam tshig mchog /
analyzed: sbyor ba gsum ni dam tshig mchog /

original: khams gsum bdag po chen po ni //
analyzed: khams gsum bdag po chen po ni //
translated: The great lord of the three realms

original: rnam par spyod par mthong ma gyur //
analyzed: rnam par spyod par mthong ma gyur //

analyzed: mi 'grub 'khor los bsgyur ba dang // khams gsum bdag po'i rgyal por 'gyur //

original: grub na de na rnal 'byor che //
analyzed: grub na de na rnal 'byor che //

original: srid pa gsum gyi bdag po 'thob //
analyzed: srid pa gsum gyi bdag po 'thob //

original: de bzhin cho ga'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: de bzhin cho ga'i sbyor ba yis //

original: stobs kyis shi ba bza' bar bya //
analyzed: stobs kyis shi ba bza' bar bya //

original: mtshams med pa ni byed pa dag /
analyzed: mtshams med pa ni byed pa dag /

original: bkug la mkhas pas byin gyis brlab //
analyzed: bkug la mkhas pas byin gyis brlab //

original: gzhan du dngos grub 'jig par 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan du dngos grub 'jig par 'gyur //

analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'tsho ba'i 'bras; ;phyugs gsad pa yi sbyor ba ni //

original: rnal 'byor ma la zhus te bya //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma la zhus te bya //

analyzed: lha bshos sgrub pa'i sbyor ba 'o //

original: ma dang sring mo lhan cig tu //
analyzed: ma dang sring mo lhan cig tu //

original: mchog dang bar ma de bzhin te //
analyzed: mchog dang bar ma de bzhin te //

original: gzhan du bu mo lhan cig tu //
analyzed: gzhan du bu mo lhan cig tu //

original: dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba //
analyzed: dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba //

original: mnyam pa mchog gi sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa mchog gi sgrub pa'o //

original: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //

original: 'dod pa lnga ni spyad par bya //
analyzed: 'dod pa lnga ni spyad par bya //

original: phag mo ru ni bdag bsgoms te //
analyzed: phag mo ru ni bdag bsgoms te //

original: lte bar sdigs mdzub bzhag nas ni //
analyzed: lte bar sdigs mdzub bzhag nas ni //

original: mkha' 'gro ma sogs 'khor lor bzhugs //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma sogs 'khor lor bzhugs //

original: lha mo rab tu dang byas nas //
analyzed: lha mo rab tu dang byas nas //

original: sgo dgu la ni zhugs nas kyang //
analyzed: sgo dgu la ni zhugs nas kyang //

original: snying po padma phug nas ni //
analyzed: snying po padma phug nas ni //

original: rnal 'byor ma ni brgyab tsam gyis //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ni brgyab tsam gyis //

original: rma skyes mchog ni btung bar bya //
analyzed: rma skyes mchog ni btung bar bya //

original: bsnun pa de yis zos na ni //
analyzed: bsnun pa de yis zos na ni //

original: sangs rgyas 'gyur gyi gzhan du min //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'gyur gyi gzhan du min //

original: mngon @189a *// par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
analyzed: mngon @189a *// par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /

analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i gnas sgrub pa'i mtshan ma'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o ////

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //

analyzed: rnal 'byor dpa' bo'i cho ga dang // rnal 'byor ma yi gnas 'byung ba //

original: 'dus pa bdag gis bshad par bya //
analyzed: 'dus pa bdag gis bshad par bya //

analyzed: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma thams cad; ;bla ma'i bka' las gzhan du min //

original: thams cad mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni //
analyzed: thams cad mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni //

original: nges par legs ba stsol bar 'gyur //
analyzed: nges par legs ba stsol bar 'gyur //

original: re'u mig dgu pa dbus su ste //
analyzed: re'u mig dgu pa dbus su ste //

analyzed: phyi rol du ni bcu drug bri; ;re'u mig dbus kyi dkyil du yang //

original: shin tu mdzes pa'i padma bri //
analyzed: shin tu mdzes pa'i padma bri //

original: sna tshogs padma brgyad pa ste //
analyzed: sna tshogs padma brgyad pa ste //
