original: lte pa dang ni ge sar bcas //
analyzed: lte pa dang ni ge sar bcas //
translated: the navel and the heart.

original: de dbus zla ba blta byas te //
analyzed: de dbus zla ba blta byas te //
translated: In the middle of that, one should see the moon,

original: aa la sogs ba rnam par sbyar //
analyzed: aa la sogs ba rnam par sbyar //
translated: and apply the vowels and so forth.

original: a'a li k'a li mnyam byas te //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li mnyam byas te //
translated: Having made the vowels and consonants equal,

original: h'um ni nang du chud par bya //
analyzed: h'um ni nang du chud par bya //
translated: one should cause the hūṃ to enter inside.

original: rdo rje sems dpas kun khyab pa //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpas kun khyab pa //
translated: Pervaded by Vajrasattva,

original: he ru ka ni rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: he ru ka ni rnam par bsgom //
translated: one should meditate on Heruka.

original: zhal lnga phyag ni bcu pa ste //
analyzed: zhal lnga phyag ni bcu pa ste //
translated: He has five faces and ten arms,

original: phag mo yis ni yongs su brgyan //
analyzed: phag mo yis ni yongs su brgyan //
translated: and is completely adorned by Vārāhī.

original: dkar zhing sngo la de bzhin dmar //
analyzed: dkar zhing sngo la de bzhin dmar //
translated: White, blue, and likewise red,

original: ljang gu ser po steng du ste //
analyzed: ljang gu ser po steng du ste //
translated: green and yellow above,

original: spyan gsum pa la 'jigs pa'i zhal //
analyzed: spyan gsum pa la 'jigs pa'i zhal //
translated: with three eyes, a terrifying face,

original: g-yas brkyang pa yi gnas pas bzhugs //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang pa yi gnas pas bzhugs //
translated: standing with the right leg extended,

original: 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan nyid //
analyzed: 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan nyid //
translated: Bhairava and Kālarātri

original: shin tu myos pas zhabs 'og gnon //
analyzed: shin tu myos pas zhabs 'og gnon //
translated: are pressed underfoot by the very passionate one.

original: thod pa'i phreng pa'i dbu rgyan can //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng pa'i dbu rgyan can //
translated: He has a head ornament of a garland of skulls,

original: zla ba phyed pa 'dzin pas mdzes //
analyzed: zla ba phyed pa 'dzin pas mdzes //
translated: and is beautified by holding a half-moon.

original: sna tshogs rdo rje cod @189b pan can //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje cod @189b pan can //
translated: He has a crown of a variegated vajra,

original: ral pa'i dbu rgyan dbu la 'ching //
analyzed: ral pa'i dbu rgyan dbu la 'ching //
translated: and a topknot of matted hair on his head.

original: phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab cing //
analyzed: phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab cing //
translated: He is sealed with the six mudras,🔽and is adorned with the five symbolic ornaments.

original: sku la rdo rje rgyan gyis spud //
analyzed: sku la rdo rje rgyan gyis spud //
translated: His body is adorned with vajra ornaments.

original: rdo rje dril pu mnyam par ldan //
analyzed: rdo rje dril pu mnyam par ldan //
translated: He is in union with the vajra and bell,

original: bde ba chen po'i bde ba mchog /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i bde ba mchog /
translated: the supreme bliss of great bliss.

original: rtse gsum dang ni cang te'u 'dzin //
analyzed: rtse gsum dang ni cang te'u 'dzin //
translated: He holds a trident and a ṭakaṭa,

original: rdo rje gri gug de bzhin te //
analyzed: rdo rje gri gug de bzhin te //
translated: a vajra flaying knife, and likewise,

original: thod pa kha tv'am tshangs pa'i mgo /
analyzed: thod pa kha tv'am tshangs pa'i mgo /
translated: a skull cup, a khaṭvāṅga, and a head of Brahmā,

original: dgra sta dang ni zhags pa'o //
analyzed: dgra sta dang ni zhags pa'o //
translated: a battle-ax, and a noose.

original: g-yas dang g-yon gyi phyag la ni //
analyzed: g-yas dang g-yon gyi phyag la ni //
translated: In his right and left hands,

original: na ra'i phags pa gos su man bas //
analyzed: na ra'i phags pa gos su man bas //
translated: the naked Nāḍīpā is his upper garment,

original: zhabs gnyis mnyam par 'khril ba ni //
analyzed: zhabs gnyis mnyam par 'khril ba ni //
translated: and his two legs are crossed in equipoise.

original: phag mo yis ni kha sbyar byas //
analyzed: phag mo yis ni kha sbyar byas //
translated: He is joined with Vārāhī,

original: de mdog phyag dang bzhugs stangs can //
analyzed: de mdog phyag dang bzhugs stangs can //
translated: the same color, hand implements, and posture,

original: dbu skra grol zhing gcer bu ste //
analyzed: dbu skra grol zhing gcer bu ste //
translated: with loose hair, and naked,

original: stag gi pags pa gos su man bas //🔽dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can //
analyzed: stag gi pags pa gos su man bas // dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can //
translated: wearing a tiger-skin skirt,🔽with a belt of bone ornaments,

original: drag po'i thod pa'i phreng ba can //
analyzed: drag po'i thod pa'i phreng ba can //
translated: and a garland of fierce heads.

original: thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos //
analyzed: thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos //
translated: He is intoxicated by the passion of compassion.🔽In the eastern petal is the dakini,

original: shar gyi 'dab la mkha' 'gro ma; ;byang du l'a ma mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: shar gyi 'dab la mkha' 'gro ma; ;byang du l'a ma mkha' 'gro ma //
translated: in the north is the Lāmā dakini,

original: nub tu dum skyes ma yin no //
analyzed: nub tu dum skyes ma yin no //
translated: and in the west is the Khaṇḍarohā.

original: lho ru gzugs can mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: lho ru gzugs can mkha' 'gro ma //
translated: In the south is Rūpiṇī, the dakini,

original: nag dang sngo bsangs dmar ser skya //
analyzed: nag dang sngo bsangs dmar ser skya //
translated: black, dark blue, red, yellow, and white.

original: phyogs kyi gos 'chang g-yas brkyang bzhugs //
analyzed: phyogs kyi gos 'chang g-yas brkyang bzhugs //
translated: She wears the garments of the directions and stands with her right leg extended.

original: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can //
translated: She has a head ornament of a garland of skulls.

original: skra grol gnyis su med pa ste //
analyzed: skra grol gnyis su med pa ste //
translated: Her hair is loose and she is nondual.

original: zur gyi cha ni thams cad du //
analyzed: zur gyi cha ni thams cad du //
translated: In all the corners

original: byang chub sems kyi snod kyang bzhag /
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi snod kyang bzhag /
translated: one should place the vessel of bodhicitta.🔽She holds a skull, khaṭvāṅga, and a small drum,

original: thod pa kha tv'am dril bu dang // cang te'u gri gug mgo bo thogs //
analyzed: thod pa kha tv'am dril bu dang // cang te'u gri gug mgo bo thogs //
translated: a flaying knife, and a head.

original: zhal gsum spyan gsum bzhin rnams bsgyur //
analyzed: zhal gsum spyan gsum bzhin rnams bsgyur //
translated: She has three faces, three eyes, and contorted faces.

original: drag po chags pa'i chags pas myos //
analyzed: drag po chags pa'i chags pas myos //
translated: She is intoxicated by the passion of passion.

original: bcom ldan bde bas gzigs nas ni //
analyzed: bcom ldan bde bas gzigs nas ni //
translated: The Bhagavān, seeing her with bliss,

original: @190a *// bde ba che la rjes su chags //🔽mgo po'i do shal 'chang ba yis //
analyzed: @190a *// bde ba che la rjes su chags // mgo po'i do shal 'chang ba yis //
translated: is attached to great bliss.🔽One should meditate on Heruka

original: he ru ka ni rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: he ru ka ni rnam par bsgom //
translated: wearing a necklace of heads.

original: 'di ltar re'u mig dbus dkyil du //
analyzed: 'di ltar re'u mig dbus dkyil du //
translated: In this way, in the center of the square,

original: mchog de dag kyang bsgom par bya //
analyzed: mchog de dag kyang bsgom par bya //
translated: one should meditate on those supreme ones.

original: de yi shar gyi re mig la pu ll'i ra ma la yan thod pa'i dum bu dang / rab gtum ma ste /
analyzed: de yi shar gyi re mig la pu ll'i ra ma la yan thod pa'i dum bu dang / rab gtum ma ste /
translated: In the eastern square is Pulliramalaya, Skull-Garland and Caṇḍī.

original: ser po'o // byang du dz'a landha ra na keng dus chen po dang / gtum mig ma ste /
analyzed: ser po'o // byang du dz'a landha ra na keng dus chen po dang / gtum mig ma ste /
translated: In the north, in Jālandhara, is Mahākeśā and Caṇḍālī,🔽blue.

original: sngon po'o // nub tu au tyan na keng rus can dang / 'od ldan ma ste /
analyzed: sngon po'o // nub tu au tyan na keng rus can dang / 'od ldan ma ste /
translated: In the west, in Oḍiyāna, is Kapālasphoṭa and Mārīcī,🔽white.

original: dkar po'o // lho ru aar bu da na mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / sna chen ma ste /
analyzed: dkar po'o // lho ru aar bu da na mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / sna chen ma ste /
translated: In the south, in Arbuda, is Daṇḍapāṇi and Mahānāsā,🔽green.

original: ljang gu'o // me'i phyogs su go da pa ri na lha dgra dang / dpa' bo'i blo gros ma ste /
analyzed: ljang gu'o // me'i phyogs su go da pa ri na lha dgra dang / dpa' bo'i blo gros ma ste /
translated: In the southeast, in Godāvarī, is Aparājita and Vīramatī,🔽red.

original: dmar po'o // bden bral du r'a me shva ra na 'od dpag med dang / mi'u thung ma ste /
analyzed: dmar po'o // bden bral du r'a me shva ra na 'od dpag med dang / mi'u thung ma ste /
translated: In the southwest, in Rāmeśvara, is Amitābha and Vāmana,

original: padma'i mdog can no //
analyzed: padma'i mdog can no //
translated: the color of a lotus.

original: rlung phyogs su de bi ko ti na rdo rje 'od dang / langka'i dbang phyug ma ste /
analyzed: rlung phyogs su de bi ko ti na rdo rje 'od dang / langka'i dbang phyug ma ste /
translated: In the northwest, in Devīkoṭa, is Vajraprabha and Laṅkeśvarī,

original: dud ka sngon po'o //
analyzed: dud ka sngon po'o //
translated: blue-green.

original: dbang ldan du m'a la ba na rdo rje lus dang / shing grib ma ste /
analyzed: dbang ldan du m'a la ba na rdo rje lus dang / shing grib ma ste /
translated: In the northeast, in Malava, is Vajrakāya and Vṛkṣaśāvarī,

original: ljang gu dang / mu tig lta bu'o //
analyzed: ljang gu dang / mu tig lta bu'o //
translated: green and the color of a pearl.

original: phyag na rdo rje dang dril bus 'khyud pa'o //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje dang dril bus 'khyud pa'o //
translated: Vajrapāṇi and Ghaṇṭā are embraced.

original: de la re'u mig gnyis pa'i shar phyogs su k'a ma r'u pa na myu gu can dang / sa srung ma ste /
analyzed: de la re'u mig gnyis pa'i shar phyogs su k'a ma r'u pa na myu gu can dang / sa srung ma ste /
translated: In the east of the second square, in Kāmarūpa, is Aṅkura and Pṛthivī.

original: dmar po'o // byang du aom dren rdo rje ral bcan dang / 'jigs byed chen mo ste /
analyzed: dmar po'o // byang du aom dren rdo rje ral bcan dang / 'jigs byed chen mo ste /
translated: They are red. In the north, in Oḍra, is Vajrāṅkuśī and Mahābhairavā.

original: ljang gu'o // nub tu tri sha ku ni na dpa' bo chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma ste /
analyzed: ljang gu'o // nub tu tri sha ku ni na dpa' bo chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma ste /
translated: They are green. In the west, in Triśakuni, is Mahāśūra and Vāyuvegā.

original: sngon po'o // lho phyogs ko sa la na rdo rje h'um @190b mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma ste /
analyzed: sngon po'o // lho phyogs ko sa la na rdo rje h'um @190b mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma ste /
translated: They are blue. In the south, in Kosala, is Vajrahūṃkāra and Surābhakṣī.

original: dkar po'o // me'i phyogs su ka lingka na rab bzang dang / sngo bsangs lha mo ste /
analyzed: dkar po'o // me'i phyogs su ka lingka na rab bzang dang / sngo bsangs lha mo ste /
translated: They are white. In the southeast, in Kaliṅga, is Subhadra and Śyāmādevī.

original: nam mkha' ser skya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' ser skya'o //
translated: They are pale yellow.

original: bden bral du lam p'a ka na rdo rje bzang dang / rab bzang ma ste /🔽dmar po'o // rlung gi phyogs su k'am po tsin 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rnam ste /
analyzed: bden bral du lam p'a ka na rdo rje bzang dang / rab bzang ma ste / dmar po'o // rlung gi phyogs su k'am po tsin 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rnam ste /
translated: In the southwest, in Lampaka, is Vajrabhadra and Subhadrā.🔽They are red. In the northwest, in Kāmboja, is Mahābhairava and Hayānanā.

original: ser bo'o // dbang ldan du hi ma la yan mig mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma ste; sngon po'o //
analyzed: ser bo'o // dbang ldan du hi ma la yan mig mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma ste; sngon po'o //
translated: They are yellow. In the northeast, in the Himalayas, is Virūpākṣa and Khagarbhikā.🔽They are blue.

original: padma dang dril bu 'dzin pas 'khyud pa'o //
analyzed: padma dang dril bu 'dzin pas 'khyud pa'o //
translated: He embraces Padmavati, who holds a lotus and a bell.

original: re'u mig gsum pa'i shar du pre ta pu ri na stobs po che dang // 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ste /
analyzed: re'u mig gsum pa'i shar du pre ta pu ri na stobs po che dang // 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ste /
translated: In the east of the third square, in Pretapuri, is Mahabala and Cakravega,

original: nam mkha' dang ser skya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang ser skya'o //
translated: who are sky-colored and tawny, respectively.

original: byang du gri ha de b'a t'a na rdo rje 'od dang du ma skyes ma ste ser po'o //
analyzed: byang du gri ha de b'a t'a na rdo rje 'od dang du ma skyes ma ste ser po'o //
translated: In the north, in Trihastivana, is Vajraprabha and Ananta, who are yellow.

original: nub tu soo r'ashda na rta mgrin dang / chang tshong ma ste /
analyzed: nub tu soo r'ashda na rta mgrin dang / chang tshong ma ste /
translated: In the west, in Sourashtra, is Hayagriva and Surabhi,🔽who are red.

original: dmar po'o // lho phyogs su barna dvi pa na nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma ste /
analyzed: dmar po'o // lho phyogs su barna dvi pa na nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma ste /
translated: In the south, in VarhadvIpa, is Akasagarbha and Cakravarmi,🔽who are blue.

original: sngon po'o // me'i phyogs su na ga ra na dpal khrag 'thung dang / rab dpa' mo ste /
analyzed: sngon po'o // me'i phyogs su na ga ra na dpal khrag 'thung dang / rab dpa' mo ste /
translated: In the southeast, in Nagara, is Shri Heruka and Pravalambha,

original: dud pa'i mdog can no //
analyzed: dud pa'i mdog can no //
translated: who are smoke-colored.

original: bde na bral du sindhu na padma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen ma ste /
analyzed: bde na bral du sindhu na padma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen ma ste /
translated: In the southwest, in Sindhu, is Padmanarteshvara and Mahabala,🔽who are green.

original: ljang gu'o // rlung gi phyogs su ma ru ta na rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor los bsgyur ma ste /
analyzed: ljang gu'o // rlung gi phyogs su ma ru ta na rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor los bsgyur ma ste /
translated: In the northwest, in Maru, is Vairochana and Chakravarmini,🔽who are white.

original: sngon po'o // dbang ldan du ku lu t'a ma rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen mo ste /
analyzed: sngon po'o // dbang ldan du ku lu t'a ma rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen mo ste /
translated: In the northeast, Kuṭī in the form of Vajrasattva and Mahāvīryā,🔽white.

original: dkar po'o // 'khor lo dang dril bu 'dzin pas 'khyud pa'o //
analyzed: dkar po'o // 'khor lo dang dril bu 'dzin pas 'khyud pa'o //
translated: He embraces her, holding a wheel and a bell.

original: gzhan yang thod pa dang / kha tv'am ga dang / cang te'u dang / gri gug @191a *//
analyzed: gzhan yang thod pa dang / kha tv'am ga dang / cang te'u dang / gri gug @191a *//
translated: He holds a skull cup, a khaṭvāṅga, a small drum, a flaying knife,

original: dang / mgo bo 'dzin pa /🔽phyag drug pa /
analyzed: dang / mgo bo 'dzin pa / phyag drug pa /
translated: and a head.

original: zhal gsum pa ste /
analyzed: zhal gsum pa ste /
translated: He has six arms and three faces.

original: zhal ni / man ngag gi rjes su 'brang bas bstan /
analyzed: zhal ni / man ngag gi rjes su 'brang bas bstan /
translated: The faces are taught according to the esoteric instructions.

original: spyan gsum pa /
analyzed: spyan gsum pa /
translated: He has three eyes.

original: g-yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa /
analyzed: g-yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa /
translated: He stands with his right leg extended.

original: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
translated: He is adorned with the five symbolic ornaments.

original: stag gi pags pa gos su man bas //🔽mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan pa ste //
analyzed: stag gi pags pa gos su man bas // mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan pa ste //
translated: He wears a tiger-skin skirt.🔽He is adorned with a garland of heads.

original: thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can //🔽rdo rje phreng dang phad 'khor lo //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can // rdo rje phreng dang phad 'khor lo //
translated: He has a crown of a garland of skulls.🔽He is adorned on his forehead with a vajra garland and a wheel,

original: ji lta'i rim pas dpral bar brgyan //
analyzed: ji lta'i rim pas dpral bar brgyan //
translated: in the proper order.

original: lha mo skra grol gcar bu ste //
analyzed: lha mo skra grol gcar bu ste //
translated: The goddess is naked with loose hair,

original: byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril //
analyzed: byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril //
translated: well wrapped with her two thighs.

original: ji ltar thabs bzhin shes rab ste //
analyzed: ji ltar thabs bzhin shes rab ste //
translated: She is wisdom, just like the method.

original: mtshan ma'i phyag rgya legs khyab pa //🔽zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
analyzed: mtshan ma'i phyag rgya legs khyab pa // zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
translated: The seal of signs is well spread out.🔽It has four corners and four doors,

original: rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan //🔽dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan pa //
analyzed: rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan // dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan pa //
translated: Adorned with four architraves.🔽It is adorned with nets and half-nets,

original: dar dang phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: dar dang phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
translated: Adorned with silk and garlands.

original: 'khor lo'i gzugs can la bkod nas //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i gzugs can la bkod nas //
translated: Having arranged the form of the wheel,

original: ji ltar mdzes par rab tu brtag //
analyzed: ji ltar mdzes par rab tu brtag //
translated: One should draw it as beautifully as possible.

original: 'di ltar phyi yi 'khor lo yi //
analyzed: 'di ltar phyi yi 'khor lo yi //
translated: In this way, in the outer wheel,

original: de la sgo srung rnams kyang dgod //🔽mtshams dang zur du lha mo rnams //
analyzed: de la sgo srung rnams kyang dgod // mtshams dang zur du lha mo rnams //
translated: One should also place the door guardians.🔽In the intermediate directions and corners,

original: mkhas pas bri bar bya ba ste //
analyzed: mkhas pas bri bar bya ba ste //
translated: The wise one should draw the goddesses.

original: cho ga du ma thos nas ni //
analyzed: cho ga du ma thos nas ni //
translated: Having heard the many rituals,

original: 'bad pas gcig tu bsdus pa yin //
analyzed: 'bad pas gcig tu bsdus pa yin //
translated: They are gathered together with effort.

original: shar gyi sgor ni khva gdong ma //
analyzed: shar gyi sgor ni khva gdong ma //
translated: At the eastern gate is Kākāsyā,

original: zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa //🔽g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal gdong ni //
analyzed: zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa // g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal gdong ni //
translated: With three faces and six arms.🔽The right and left faces

original: bya rog chu skyar zhal yin te //
analyzed: bya rog chu skyar zhal yin te //
translated: Are the faces of a crow and a heron.

original: mi 'u thung la mi sdug zhal //
analyzed: mi 'u thung la mi sdug zhal //
translated: A short, ugly human face🔽At the northern gate is Ulūkā,

original: byang gi sgor ni 'ug gu dang // 'ug pa byi la rnam mdzes te //
analyzed: byang gi sgor ni 'ug gu dang // 'ug pa byi la rnam mdzes te //
translated: Beautiful with an owl and mongoose face.

original: g-yas dang @191b g-yon gyi zhal gdong gi /
analyzed: g-yas dang @191b g-yon gyi zhal gdong gi /
translated: The faces on the right and left

original: lce bskyod 'jigs pa'i gzugs can ma //
analyzed: lce bskyod 'jigs pa'i gzugs can ma //
translated: are terrifying, with tongues that dart out.

original: nub tu bha ba gi zhes pa //
analyzed: nub tu bha ba gi zhes pa //
translated: In the west is Bhava,

original: khyi dang seng+ge'i gdong pa can //
analyzed: khyi dang seng+ge'i gdong pa can //
translated: with the face of a dog and a lion.

original: g-yon ba dang ni g-yas pa yi //
analyzed: g-yon ba dang ni g-yas pa yi //
translated: The tongues dart out from the left and right🔽faces, which are very beautiful.

original: lce bskyod shin tu mdzes pa'o; ;lho phyogs sa 'dzin lha mo ni //🔽phag gdong ma he'i gzugs can te //
analyzed: lce bskyod shin tu mdzes pa'o; ;lho phyogs sa 'dzin lha mo ni // phag gdong ma he'i gzugs can te //
translated: In the south is the goddess Dharaṇī,🔽with the face of a pig and the form of a buffalo.

original: g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal gdong ni //
analyzed: g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal gdong ni //
translated: The faces on the right and left

original: zab cing drag la 'jigs pa 'o //
analyzed: zab cing drag la 'jigs pa 'o //
translated: are deep, fierce, and terrifying.🔽The first is called “Raven Face,”

original: thog ma khva gdong zhes bya ba; ;gnyis pa 'ug pa de bzhin te //
analyzed: thog ma khva gdong zhes bya ba; ;gnyis pa 'ug pa de bzhin te //
translated: the second is likewise “Owl Face,”

original: gsum pa khyi yi gdong can la //
analyzed: gsum pa khyi yi gdong can la //
translated: the third has the face of a dog,

original: bzhi pa dag ni phag nyid do //
analyzed: bzhi pa dag ni phag nyid do //
translated: and the fourth is indeed a pig.

original: sngo dang dud ka dkar po'i gdong //
analyzed: sngo dang dud ka dkar po'i gdong //
translated: Blue, smoke-colored, and white faces,

original: ljang gu ser po dmar po ste //
analyzed: ljang gu ser po dmar po ste //
translated: green, yellow, and red,

original: ser zhing dmar la sngo ba'i zhal //
analyzed: ser zhing dmar la sngo ba'i zhal //
translated: yellow, red, and blue faces,

original: dkar dang sngo dang ljang gu'i mdog /
analyzed: dkar dang sngo dang ljang gu'i mdog /
translated: white, blue, and green colors,

original: dang po me nas dbang ldan bar //🔽gshin rje sreg ma pho nya mo //
analyzed: dang po me nas dbang ldan bar // gshin rje sreg ma pho nya mo //
translated: beginning from the southeast to the northeast,🔽are Yama, Rakṣa, and Dūtamā.

original: gshin rje mche ba 'joms pa nyid //
analyzed: gshin rje mche ba 'joms pa nyid //
translated: Yama, Dākinī, and Caṇḍālī🔽are in the south, west, and north.

original: dmar dang ser dang ljang gu dang // sngo dang ser dang ljang gu dang // dud ka ser dang ljang gu dang // dkar dang ser dang ljang gu ste //
analyzed: dmar dang ser dang ljang gu dang // sngo dang ser dang ljang gu dang // dud ka ser dang ljang gu dang // dkar dang ser dang ljang gu ste //
translated: and white, yellow, and green.

original: de dag zhal gsum phyag drug ste //
analyzed: de dag zhal gsum phyag drug ste //
translated: They have three faces and six arms.

original: spyan gsum g-yas pa brkyang bas bzhugs //
analyzed: spyan gsum g-yas pa brkyang bas bzhugs //

original: phyogs kyi gos 'chang gsus pa 'phyang //
analyzed: phyogs kyi gos 'chang gsus pa 'phyang //
translated: wearing the garb of the directions, with protruding bellies.

original: dbu skra dag ni grol ba ste //
analyzed: dbu skra dag ni grol ba ste //
translated: Their hair is loose.

original: phyag rgya lnga yis rgyas btab cing //
analyzed: phyag rgya lnga yis rgyas btab cing //
translated: They are sealed with the five symbolic ornaments,

original: 'khor lo dag ni thams cad kyang //
analyzed: 'khor lo dag ni thams cad kyang //
translated: and all of them

original: yi dvags steng du rnam par bzhugs /
analyzed: yi dvags steng du rnam par bzhugs /
translated: stand on a corpse seat.🔽They stand on a variegated lotus, sun,

original: sna tshogs padma nyi ma dang // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la bzhugs //🔽thod pa dang ni kha tv'am ga /
analyzed: sna tshogs padma nyi ma dang // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la bzhugs // thod pa dang ni kha tv'am ga /
translated: and moon mandala.🔽They hold a skull cup, khaṭvāṅga,🔽lasso, iron hook, hand drum,

original: zhags pa lcags kyu cang te'u dang // mgo bo gri gug phyag na 'chang //🔽thod pa'i phreng bas @192a *//
analyzed: zhags pa lcags kyu cang te'u dang // mgo bo gri gug phyag na 'chang // thod pa'i phreng bas @192a *//
translated: head, and flaying knife in their hands.

original: rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: rnam par brgyan //
translated: They are adorned with a garland of skulls.

original: dga' zhing dgyes pas rnam par myos //
analyzed: dga' zhing dgyes pas rnam par myos //
translated: They are intoxicated with passion and joy.

original: rjes su chags pa'i zhal gdong ni //
analyzed: rjes su chags pa'i zhal gdong ni //
translated: Their faces are contorted with passion.

original: 'jigs pa'i sdang mig 'gyur ba 'o //🔽de nas gshin rje sreg sogs sgo //
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i sdang mig 'gyur ba 'o // de nas gshin rje sreg sogs sgo //
translated: With fearful, angry eyes.🔽Then, Yama, Rakshasa, and so forth,🔽At the gates, and in the intermediate directions,

original: khva gdong la sogs mtshams su ste //
analyzed: khva gdong la sogs mtshams su ste //
translated: Kaka, and so forth,

original: rang gi thabs dang mnyam par gzhag /
analyzed: rang gi thabs dang mnyam par gzhag /

original: sbyor ba'i rim pa bsgoms nas ni //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i rim pa bsgoms nas ni //
translated: Having meditated on the stages of union,

original: 'khor lo dpa' bo thams cad kyang //
analyzed: 'khor lo dpa' bo thams cad kyang //

original: ji bzhin rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste //
analyzed: ji bzhin rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste //

original: snga ma'i rjes su thams cad kyang //
analyzed: snga ma'i rjes su thams cad kyang //
translated: All of them, in the same way as before,

original: mkha' 'gro ma sogs kun de bzhin //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma sogs kun de bzhin //

original: ji bzhin bla ma'i bka' bzhin du //
analyzed: ji bzhin bla ma'i bka' bzhin du //

original: ji ltar 'dod pa gnas de bzhin //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pa gnas de bzhin //

original: ji ltar sems kyi khyad par gyis //
analyzed: ji ltar sems kyi khyad par gyis //

original: rnal 'byor ma yi dkyil 'khor bsgom //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi dkyil 'khor bsgom //
translated: So the mandala of yoginis is meditated.

original: bum pa sna tshogs sbyor ba yis //🔽thod pa yis ni yongs su brgyan //
analyzed: bum pa sna tshogs sbyor ba yis // thod pa yis ni yongs su brgyan //
translated: With the vase of various substances,🔽Adorned with skulls,

original: 'o mas bkang ba'i thod pa ni //
analyzed: 'o mas bkang ba'i thod pa ni //
translated: A skull filled with milk

original: bum pa'i steng du gzhag par bya //
analyzed: bum pa'i steng du gzhag par bya //

original: phyi rol yongs su bskor ba ste //
analyzed: phyi rol yongs su bskor ba ste //
translated: Surrounding it on the outside,

original: sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma gnas pa //
analyzed: sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma gnas pa //

original: glu dang gar ni nyer ldan pas //
analyzed: glu dang gar ni nyer ldan pas //
translated: Endowed with song and dance,

original: sna tshogs rol mo rnam par sprul //
analyzed: sna tshogs rol mo rnam par sprul //
translated: And various musical instruments.🔽Flowers, incense, lamps,

original: me tog bdug spos mar me dang // dri dang gos mchog dam pa ste //
analyzed: me tog bdug spos mar me dang // dri dang gos mchog dam pa ste //
translated: Perfume, and the best of clothes,

original: sna tshogs dam tshig ro yi zas //
analyzed: sna tshogs dam tshig ro yi zas //
translated: The pledge of various tastes,🔽And various foods, one should worship with beer.

original: sna tshogs bza' ba chang gis mchod; ;dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mchog dam pa //
analyzed: sna tshogs bza' ba chang gis mchod; ;dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mchog dam pa //
translated: The supreme, excellent, various maṇḍala

original: phyi rol yi dvags gyis yongs bskor //
analyzed: phyi rol yi dvags gyis yongs bskor //
translated: Is surrounded by the outer pretas.

original: dngos dang dngos med rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med rnam par bsgom //
translated: One should meditate on the form and formless.🔽In accordance with the guru’s instruction, the wheel

original: bla ma'i man ngag bka' bzhin @192b du; ;rdo rje pad bskor 'khor lo ni //
analyzed: bla ma'i man ngag bka' bzhin @192b du; ;rdo rje pad bskor 'khor lo ni //
translated: Is turned with the vajra and lotus,

original: zur bzhi par ni rab tu gnas //🔽mtshams su rdo rje phyed pas mtshan //
analyzed: zur bzhi par ni rab tu gnas // mtshams su rdo rje phyed pas mtshan //
translated: And well placed in the four corners.🔽The intermediate directions are marked with half-vajras.

original: rdo rje ka ba'i mdun dbus su //
analyzed: rdo rje ka ba'i mdun dbus su //
translated: In the center in front of the vajra pillar

original: re'u mig rdo rje ldan par bya //
analyzed: re'u mig rdo rje ldan par bya //
translated: One should make a square with a vajra.

original: sna tshogs pa yi cho ga mchog /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa yi cho ga mchog /
translated: The supreme ritual of the various

original: gnas sogs rim pas dgod par bya //
analyzed: gnas sogs rim pas dgod par bya //
translated: Is arranged in stages, beginning with the place.

original: khams dang phung po de bzhin te //
analyzed: khams dang phung po de bzhin te //
translated: The elements and the aggregates,

original: skye mched drug kyang rnam par dgod //
analyzed: skye mched drug kyang rnam par dgod //
translated: And also the six sense bases, are arranged.

original: ye shes rdo rje rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje rnam par bsgom //
translated: One should meditate on the vajra of pristine consciousness.

original: sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba yis //
translated: Through the union of body, speech, and mind,

original: ye shes 'khor lo mthong ba na //
analyzed: ye shes 'khor lo mthong ba na //

original: aargham zhabs bsil dag gis mchod //
analyzed: aargham zhabs bsil dag gis mchod //

original: dam tshig sna tshogs mchog dam pa //
analyzed: dam tshig sna tshogs mchog dam pa //

original: sna tshogs pa yi khyad par gyis //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa yi khyad par gyis //

original: m'am sa rakta dag gis mchod //🔽go cha gnyis po sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: m'am sa rakta dag gis mchod // go cha gnyis po sbyor ba yis //
translated: One should make offerings with maṃsa and rakta.🔽The supreme, sacred pledge of the pristine consciousness of the mudra

original: phyag rgya ye shes mchog dam pa //
analyzed: phyag rgya ye shes mchog dam pa //
translated: Is the two kinds of armor.

original: ro gcig ma lus bsgoms na ni //
analyzed: ro gcig ma lus bsgoms na ni //
translated: If one meditates on the single taste of all,

original: ye shes 'khor lo rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: ye shes 'khor lo rnam par bsgom //
translated: One meditates on the wheel of pristine consciousness.

original: reg pa yi ni khyad par gyis //
analyzed: reg pa yi ni khyad par gyis //
translated: The distinctions of touch

original: mkhas pas sbyor ba gsum du sbyar //
analyzed: mkhas pas sbyor ba gsum du sbyar //
translated: Are applied by the wise to the three applications.

original: bsgoms pas rnam par dag pa'i don //
analyzed: bsgoms pas rnam par dag pa'i don //
translated: The meaning of the purification of meditation

original: mkhas pas sum cu rtsa bdun te //🔽ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: mkhas pas sum cu rtsa bdun te // ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: Is the thirty-seven of the wise.

original: dam tshig gsum gyi mchog gis bza'//🔽spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: dam tshig gsum gyi mchog gis bza'// spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: The supreme of the three sacred pledges is eaten🔽With the application of the repetition of pristine consciousness.🔽The meditation of the repetition

original: bzlas pa'i bsgom ba rnam par bsgom //🔽dus bzhi dag tu dam tshig can //
analyzed: bzlas pa'i bsgom ba rnam par bsgom // dus bzhi dag tu dam tshig can //
translated: Is meditated with the application of emanating and gathering.🔽The one with sacred pledge🔽Should guard the application of the places with the four times.

original: gnas sbyor mkhas bas bsrung bar bya; ;sa steng du ni mthong ba kun //
analyzed: gnas sbyor mkhas bas bsrung bar bya; ;sa steng du ni mthong ba kun //
translated: All that is seen on the surface of the earth

original: thams cad he ru ka dpal gzugs //
analyzed: thams cad he ru ka dpal gzugs //
translated: All forms are the form of glorious Heruka.

original: 'gro ba drug po'i srid pa sbyangs //
analyzed: 'gro ba drug po'i srid pa sbyangs //
translated: Purify the existence of the six classes of beings.

original: sems can don ni gzhal med byas //
analyzed: sems can don ni gzhal med byas //
translated: Do immeasurable benefit for sentient beings.

original: thams cad zhugs te zhugs @193a *//
analyzed: thams cad zhugs te zhugs @193a *//

original: sbyor bas // 'dis ni thams cad gzhug par bya //
analyzed: sbyor bas // 'dis ni thams cad gzhug par bya //

original: 'di ni sbyor ba nges pa ste //
analyzed: 'di ni sbyor ba nges pa ste //
translated: This is the union, the commitment.

original: nges pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: nges pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
translated: One will attain the definite spiritual powers.🔽With a garland of great conches,

original: dung chen phreng ba dag gis ni; ;dam tshig mchog gis bzlas pa bya //
analyzed: dung chen phreng ba dag gis ni; ;dam tshig mchog gis bzlas pa bya //
translated: recite with the supreme commitment.

original: tshogs kyi go cha'i rim pa bzhin //
analyzed: tshogs kyi go cha'i rim pa bzhin //
translated: In the sequence of the feast armor,

original: rnal 'byor pa yis sngags mchog bzla //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yis sngags mchog bzla //
translated: the yogin should recite the supreme mantra.

original: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam d'a ki n'i dz'a la sam ba ram hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam d'a ki n'i dz'a la sam ba ram hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī vajra he he ru ru kā dakini jālā sambara hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom hr'i: ha ha hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom hr'i: ha ha hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ ha ha hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //🔽aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o // aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: This is the essence and the quintessence.🔽Oṃ vajra vairocanīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra warna n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra warna n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ sarva buddha dakiniye vajra varṇanīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: phag mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //
analyzed: phag mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //
translated: The essence and the quintessence of Varahi.

original: aom ka ra ka ra khanda ka p'a li hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ka ra ka ra khanda ka p'a li hum h'um phat/
translated: Om kara kara khandakapali hum hum phat.

original: aom pra tsande hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom pra tsande hum h'um phat/
translated: Om pracandali hum hum phat.

original: aom ku ru ku ru ma h'a kam ka la hum h'um phat/🔽aom tsand'a ksh'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ku ru ku ru ma h'a kam ka la hum h'um phat/ aom tsand'a ksh'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Om kuru kuru mahakamkali hum hum phat.🔽Om candakshiye hum hum phat.

original: aom bandha bandha kam ka la hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom bandha bandha kam ka la hum h'um phat/
translated: Om bandha bandha kamkali hum hum phat.

original: aom pra bh'a ba t'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom pra bh'a ba t'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Om prabhavataye hum hum phat.

original: aom tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya bi ka ta dam shti ni hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya bi ka ta dam shti ni hum h'um phat/
translated: Om trasaya trasaya vikata damshtrini hum hum phat.

original: aom ma h'a n'a se hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ma h'a n'a se hum h'um phat/
translated: Om mahanase hum hum phat.

original: aom ksho bha ya ksho bha ya su ra bee ri ni hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ksho bha ya ksho bha ya su ra bee ri ni hum h'um phat/
translated: Om kshobhaya kshobhaya suryabherinI hum hum phat.

original: aom b'i ra ma tr'i ye hum h'um phat/🔽aom hroom hroom aa mi tr'a bhe hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom b'i ra ma tr'i ye hum h'um phat/ aom hroom hroom aa mi tr'a bhe hum h'um phat/
translated: Om viryamatriye hum hum phat.🔽Om hrom hrom amitrabhe hum hum phat.

original: aom kharba ri ye hum h'um phat/🔽aom hra hra badzra pra bhe hum h'um phat/🔽aom lam ke shva r'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom kharba ri ye hum h'um phat/ aom hra hra badzra pra bhe hum h'um phat/ aom lam ke shva r'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Om ksharvariye hum hum phat.🔽Om hram hram vajra prabhe hum hum phat.🔽Om lamkesharireye hum hum phat.

original: aom phem phem badzra de he hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom phem phem badzra de he hum h'um phat/
translated: Om phem phem vajra dehe hum hum phat.

original: aom dru matstsha ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom dru matstsha ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ dhuṃcaye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom phat phat aam ku ri ke hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom phat phat aam ku ri ke hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ phaṭ phaṭ aṅkurīke hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom aee r'a ba t'i ye hum h'um phat/🔽aom da ha da ha badzra dza ti la hum h'um phat/🔽aom ma h'a bhee ra ba ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom aee r'a ba t'i ye hum h'um phat/ aom da ha da ha badzra dza ti la hum h'um phat/ aom ma h'a bhee ra ba ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ ekarāvaṭīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ daṃ daṃ vajra-jaṭila hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ mahābhairava-ye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom pa tsa pa tsa ma h'a b'i ra hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom pa tsa pa tsa ma h'a b'i ra hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ paṭa paṭa mahābala hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom b'a yu be @193b ge hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom b'a yu be @193b ge hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ āyur-vege hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom bhaksha bhaksha badzra h'um k'a ra ba sa ru dhi ra aantra m'a l'a ba lam bi ni hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom bhaksha bhaksha badzra h'um k'a ra ba sa ru dhi ra aantra m'a l'a ba lam bi ni hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ bakṣa bakṣa vajra-huṃkāra-vasuru-dhīra-antramālā-valmīni hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom su ra bhakshi ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom su ra bhakshi ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ surābakṣiye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom grihna grihna su bha dra sa pa p'a t'a la ga ta bhu dzam ga sarba b'a ta rdzdza ya tardzdza ya hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom grihna grihna su bha dra sa pa p'a t'a la ga ta bhu dzam ga sarba b'a ta rdzdza ya tardzdza ya hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ gṛhṇa gṛhṇa subhadra saparivāra-gata-bhujaṅga sarva-vātarajjhaya tarjja-ya hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom shy'a ma de b'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom shy'a ma de b'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ śyāmadevīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom a'a kaddhya a'a kaddhya badzra bha dre hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom a'a kaddhya a'a kaddhya badzra bha dre hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ akaddhya akaddhya vajra-bhadrī hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom su bha dre hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom su bha dre hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ subhadrī hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom hrim hrim ma h'a bhee ra ba hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom hrim hrim ma h'a bhee ra ba hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ hriṃ hriṃ mahābhairava hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom ha ya karne hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ha ya karne hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ haya karṇe hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom dznoom dznoom bi r'u p'aksha hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom dznoom dznoom bi r'u p'aksha hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ jhoṃ jhoṃ virūpākṣa hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom kha ga na ne hum h'um phat/🔽aom kshm'am kshm'am ma h'a ba la hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom kha ga na ne hum h'um phat/ aom kshm'am kshm'am ma h'a ba la hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ khaṃ khaṃ gaṇeśa hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ kṣmaṃ kṣmaṃ mahābala hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom tsakra be ge hum h'um phat/🔽aom ham ham ratna badzra hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom tsakra be ge hum h'um phat/ aom ham ham ratna badzra hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ cakravegā hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ haṃ haṃ ratnavajra hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom khanda ro he hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom khanda ro he hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ khaṃ khaṃ kharvarī hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom hrim hrim ha ya gr'i ba hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom hrim hrim ha ya gr'i ba hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ hriṃ hriṃ hayagrīva hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom shoondi n'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom shoondi n'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ śonitanīyā hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom h'um h'um a'a k'a sha garbhe hum h'um phat/🔽aom tsakra ba rmi n'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom h'um h'um a'a k'a sha garbhe hum h'um phat/ aom tsakra ba rmi n'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ hūṃ hūṃ ākāśagarbhā hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ cakravarmiṇīyā hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom ki li ki li he ru ka hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ki li ki li he ru ka hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ kiṃ kiṃ heruka hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom su b'i re hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom su b'i re hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ subhadrā hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom shi li shi li padma na rte shva ri hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom shi li shi li padma na rte shva ri hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ śili śili padmanarteśvarī hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom ma h'a bha le hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ma h'a bha le hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ mahābalā hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom hi li hi li bee ro tsa n'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom hi li hi li bee ro tsa n'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ hilī hilī varocaniye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom tsa kra barti n'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom tsa kra barti n'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ cakravartinīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom dhi li dhi li badzra satva hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom dhi li dhi li badzra satva hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ dhili dhili vajrasattva hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom ma h'a b'i rye hum h'um phat/🔽aom d'a ki n'i ye hum h'um phat/🔽aom l'a me hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ma h'a b'i rye hum h'um phat/ aom d'a ki n'i ye hum h'um phat/ aom l'a me hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ mahāvairye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ ḍākinīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ lāmāye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom khanda ro he hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom khanda ro he hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ khaṇḍarohe hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom r'u pi n'i ye hum h'um phat/🔽aom k'a k'a sye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom r'u pi n'i ye hum h'um phat/ aom k'a k'a sye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ rūpiṇīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ kākyāsyāye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom au l'u k'a sye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom au l'u k'a sye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ uluka-āsyāye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom shv'a n'a sye hum h'um phat/🔽aom s'u ka r'a sye hum h'um phat; aom ya ma d'a dh'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom shv'a n'a sye hum h'um phat/ aom s'u ka r'a sye hum h'um phat; aom ya ma d'a dh'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ śvāna-āsyāye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ sūkarikāsyāye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ yamādādīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom ya ma du t'i ye hum h'um phat/🔽aom ya ma damsht'i n'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ya ma du t'i ye hum h'um phat/ aom ya ma damsht'i n'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ yamadūtaīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ yamadamṣṭrīṇīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom ya ma ma tha n'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ya ma ma tha n'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ yamamathanīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: rnal 'byor cho ga bzlas tsam gyis //
analyzed: rnal 'byor cho ga bzlas tsam gyis //
translated: By merely reciting the yoga procedure,

original: rdo rje @194a *//🔽bkug cing gnas nas su //
analyzed: rdo rje @194a *// bkug cing gnas nas su //
translated: the vajra🔽is summoned and shaken from its place.

original: 'khrug cing rab tu g-yo ba ste //
analyzed: 'khrug cing rab tu g-yo ba ste //
translated: It trembles and shakes violently.

original: lus las 'od 'bar dgod pa dang // de yi mig ni 'bar ba dang // tshig 'jam pa dang 'bar ba dang // rnal 'byor pas ni bzlas tsam gyis //
analyzed: lus las 'od 'bar dgod pa dang // de yi mig ni 'bar ba dang // tshig 'jam pa dang 'bar ba dang // rnal 'byor pas ni bzlas tsam gyis //
translated: and with a gentle word, blazing,🔽the yogin, merely by reciting,🔽sees the vajra enter,

original: rdo rje 'jug pa mthong ba dang // sngags pa mnyam bzhag bzlas nas ni //
analyzed: rdo rje 'jug pa mthong ba dang // sngags pa mnyam bzhag bzlas nas ni //
translated: and the reciter, in equipoise,

original: dam tshig spyod pa ldan byas nas //
analyzed: dam tshig spyod pa ldan byas nas //
translated: having engaged in the conduct of the commitments,

original: srog dang rtsol ba bsngams byas te //
analyzed: srog dang rtsol ba bsngams byas te //
translated: having bound the life-force and exertion,

original: gsal byed hum ni brjod nas kyang //
analyzed: gsal byed hum ni brjod nas kyang //
translated: having uttered the letter ha,

original: chos kyi dbyings su spro bar bya //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings su spro bar bya //
translated: he should emanate into the realm of phenomena.🔽In order to benefit all sentient beings🔽and to subdue those difficult to subdue,

original: sems can kun la phan pa dang // gdul dka' ba dag 'dul ba'i phyir; ;sangs rgyas chos rnams mdun du spro //
analyzed: sems can kun la phan pa dang // gdul dka' ba dag 'dul ba'i phyir; ;sangs rgyas chos rnams mdun du spro //
translated: he should emanate the buddhas and the teachings.

original: khro bo'i go 'phang de mthong nas //
analyzed: khro bo'i go 'phang de mthong nas //
translated: Having seen that wrathful state,

original: khams gsum dag tu bsdu bar bya //
analyzed: khams gsum dag tu bsdu bar bya //
translated: he should gather them into the three realms.

original: lus ngag yid la bcug nas kyang //
analyzed: lus ngag yid la bcug nas kyang //
translated: Having placed them in body, speech, and mind,

original: sa steng du ni spyod pa spyad //
analyzed: sa steng du ni spyod pa spyad //
translated: he should engage in conduct on the surface of the earth.

original: mnyam gzhag min pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: mnyam gzhag min pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
translated: The yogin who is not in equipoise,

original: snying rjes brlan pa nyid kyis ni //
analyzed: snying rjes brlan pa nyid kyis ni //
translated: moistened by compassion,

original: sems can thams cad mthong ba ni //
analyzed: sems can thams cad mthong ba ni //
translated: sees all sentient beings🔽as the nature of the three realms.

original: srid pa gsum po he ru ka //
analyzed: srid pa gsum po he ru ka //
translated: The three worlds are Heruka.

original: sngags pa ci dang ci za ba //
analyzed: sngags pa ci dang ci za ba //
translated: Whatever a mantrin eats

original: dam tshig mchog ni bsgoms nas kyang //
analyzed: dam tshig mchog ni bsgoms nas kyang //
translated: and meditates on the supreme commitment,

original: thams cad chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal //
analyzed: thams cad chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal //
translated: all is the lord of Dharma, the Victor,

original: mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas //
translated: well-established in sameness.

original: dam tshig can ni langs dus su //
analyzed: dam tshig can ni langs dus su //
translated: When the one with commitment rises,

original: bla ma mchod pa rjes dran nas //
analyzed: bla ma mchod pa rjes dran nas //
translated: recollecting the worship of the guru,

original: byang chub sems kyi chus khrus bya //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi chus khrus bya //
translated: he should wash with the water of awakening mind.

original: yid 'ong phyag rgya la gnas nas //
analyzed: yid 'ong phyag rgya la gnas nas //
translated: Abiding in the delightful seal,🔽having blessed the state of the wrathful Buddha, the hero,

original: khro bo sangs rgyas dpa' bo dang // rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro @194b ma'i; ;go 'phang du ni byin brlabs nas //
analyzed: khro bo sangs rgyas dpa' bo dang // rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro @194b ma'i; ;go 'phang du ni byin brlabs nas //
translated: the yoginīs, and the ḍākinīs,

original: yid 'ong mchod pa dag tu bshad //
analyzed: yid 'ong mchod pa dag tu bshad //
translated: it is explained as the delightful worship.🔽One should make aspirations

original: mkha' dbyings dkyil 'khor khyab pa la //🔽smon lam dag ni bya ba yin //
analyzed: mkha' dbyings dkyil 'khor khyab pa la // smon lam dag ni bya ba yin //
translated: pervading the maṇḍala of the sky.🔽The instant yoga

original: de ma thag pa'i rnal 'byor gyis; ;rgyu dang mi rgyu mthong ba ni //
analyzed: de ma thag pa'i rnal 'byor gyis; ;rgyu dang mi rgyu mthong ba ni //
translated: is seeing the animate and inanimate world

original: rang bzhin dag pa bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: rang bzhin dag pa bcom ldan 'das //
translated: as the pure nature, the Bhagavān.

original: rang bzhin yang ni dngos med byas //
analyzed: rang bzhin yang ni dngos med byas //
translated: The nature is also made non-existent.

original: sems can rang bzhin dag pa ste //
analyzed: sems can rang bzhin dag pa ste //
translated: Sentient beings are pure by nature.

original: srid pa mchog tu byas pa yin; ;rdo rje phag mo bla med pa //
analyzed: srid pa mchog tu byas pa yin; ;rdo rje phag mo bla med pa //
translated: And the supreme existence is made.🔽Having blessed the mudra

original: phyag rgya ru ni byin brlabs nas //🔽rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: phyag rgya ru ni byin brlabs nas // rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
translated: With the unsurpassed Vajravarahi,

original: thams cad 'di ltar rab tu brtag /
analyzed: thams cad 'di ltar rab tu brtag /
translated: One should visualize everything in this way🔽With the yoga of one's deity.

original: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las; re'u mig dgod pa dang / gnas bsdu ba bstan pa ste le'u bcu gsum pa'o ////
analyzed: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las; re'u mig dgod pa dang / gnas bsdu ba bstan pa ste le'u bcu gsum pa'o ////
translated: This concludes chapter thirteen, the explanation of the arrangement of the maṇḍala and the gathering of the places, from The Tantra of the Supreme Original Buddha.

original: de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, the secret will be explained.🔽Since the gathering place is supreme,

original: gnas dang 'dus pa mchog yin pas; ;dngos grub kun gyi rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: gnas dang 'dus pa mchog yin pas; ;dngos grub kun gyi rang bzhin ni //
translated: The nature of all accomplishments

original: mnyam par 'dres pa bcud du 'gyur //
analyzed: mnyam par 'dres pa bcud du 'gyur //
translated: Is the essence of the equal mixture.

original: gnyis med blos ni mnyam bzhag ste //🔽'khor lo gsum mdog ldan par ni //🔽dkyil 'khor gru bzhi'i dbus dag tu //
analyzed: gnyis med blos ni mnyam bzhag ste // 'khor lo gsum mdog ldan par ni // dkyil 'khor gru bzhi'i dbus dag tu //
translated: With nondual mind, one should rest in equipoise.🔽In the center of the square maṇḍala,

original: nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i 'khor lo mchog /
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i 'khor lo mchog /
translated: One should draw the supreme maṇḍala of the twenty-four.

original: de yi dbus su padma che //
analyzed: de yi dbus su padma che //
translated: In the center of that, there is a great lotus

original: sna tshogs padma legs par mdzes //
analyzed: sna tshogs padma legs par mdzes //
translated: Adorned with a multicolored lotus.

original: 'dab ma brgyad pa lte bar bcas //
analyzed: 'dab ma brgyad pa lte bar bcas //
translated: It has eight petals and a center,

original: ge sar dag gis nye bar mdzes //
analyzed: ge sar dag gis nye bar mdzes //
translated: And is beautified by stamens.

original: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
analyzed: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
translated: It has four corners and four doors,

original: rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan //
translated: And is adorned with four arched gates.

original: phreng ba dang ni phreng phyed brgyan //
analyzed: phreng ba dang ni phreng phyed brgyan //
translated: It is adorned with garlands and half-garlands,

original: mtshan nyid kun dang yang dag ldan //🔽nyi ma'i dkyil @195a *//
analyzed: mtshan nyid kun dang yang dag ldan // nyi ma'i dkyil @195a *//
translated: And is endowed with all the characteristics.

original: 'khor dbus su ni //
analyzed: 'khor dbus su ni //
translated: In the center of a sun maṇḍala,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che //
translated: One should meditate on Vajrasattva, the great bliss,

original: a'a li k'a li zhu gyur las //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li zhu gyur las //
translated: From which the vowels and consonants melt.

original: ye shes lnga ni rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: ye shes lnga ni rnam par bsgom //
translated: One should meditate on the five gnoses.

original: de yi yongs su 'phel 'gyur bas //
analyzed: de yi yongs su 'phel 'gyur bas //
translated: From their complete development,

original: rdo rje he ru ka rnam bsgom //
analyzed: rdo rje he ru ka rnam bsgom //
translated: One should meditate on Vajrahūṃkāra.

original: dus mtha'i me chen tshol ba yis //
analyzed: dus mtha'i me chen tshol ba yis //
translated: The great fire at the end of time

original: gdul dka' thams cad rab tu gsheg /
analyzed: gdul dka' thams cad rab tu gsheg /
translated: Completely consumes all that is difficult to tame.

original: 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag /
analyzed: 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag /
translated: Bhairava and Kālarātri

original: zhabs kyi 'og tu rnam gnon cing //
analyzed: zhabs kyi 'og tu rnam gnon cing //
translated: Are suppressed under his feet.

original: zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs //
analyzed: zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs //
translated: His face bares its fangs,

original: spyan gsum 'jigs pa rab tu 'jigs //
analyzed: spyan gsum 'jigs pa rab tu 'jigs //
translated: His three eyes are terrifying.

original: sku lus dag ni sngon po las //
analyzed: sku lus dag ni sngon po las //
translated: His body is blue,

original: sdo zhing 'bar ba'i sku yang sprul //
analyzed: sdo zhing 'bar ba'i sku yang sprul //
translated: And he emanates a dark blazing body.

original: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can //
translated: He has a crown of skulls

original: sangs rgyas lngas ni byin gyis brlabs //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lngas ni byin gyis brlabs //
translated: And is empowered by the five buddhas.

original: sna tshogs rdo rje dbu rgyan can //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje dbu rgyan can //
translated: He has a crest of a vajra cross,

original: zla ba phyed pa rnam par mdzes //
analyzed: zla ba phyed pa rnam par mdzes //
translated: and is beautified by a half-moon.

original: zhal drug dpa' po mi sdug pa //
analyzed: zhal drug dpa' po mi sdug pa //
translated: He has six faces, a hero, and is ugly,🔽graceful, laughing,

original: sgeg pa dang ni bzhad ba dang // drag shul 'jigs pa'i sku lus can //
analyzed: sgeg pa dang ni bzhad ba dang // drag shul 'jigs pa'i sku lus can //
translated: and has a body of wrathful terror.

original: phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab cing //
analyzed: phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab cing //
translated: He is sealed with the six mudras,

original: sku ni sna tshogs rgyan gyis spud //
analyzed: sku ni sna tshogs rgyan gyis spud //
translated: and his body is adorned with various ornaments.

original: phag mo dang ni yang dag ldan //
analyzed: phag mo dang ni yang dag ldan //
translated: He is united with Vārāhī,

original: byin pa dag gis gnyis med 'khyud //🔽g-yas brkyang ba yi zhabs gnas shing //
analyzed: byin pa dag gis gnyis med 'khyud // g-yas brkyang ba yi zhabs gnas shing //
translated: embracing her with his two thighs.🔽He stands with his right leg straight

original: g-yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs //
analyzed: g-yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs //
translated: and his left leg bent.

original: ha ha mdzad cing hum h'um mdzad //
analyzed: ha ha mdzad cing hum h'um mdzad //
translated: He laughs ha ha, and makes the sound hūṃ hūṃ,

original: hi hi mdzad cing 'jigs pa can //
analyzed: hi hi mdzad cing 'jigs pa can //
translated: he laughs hi hi, and is terrifying.

original: hum h'um mdzad cing phat phat can //
analyzed: hum h'um mdzad cing phat phat can //
translated: He makes the sound hūṃ hūṃ, and the sound phaṭ phaṭ,

original: aa ta ta yi sgra chen smra //
analyzed: aa ta ta yi sgra chen smra //
translated: and he speaks with the great sound a ta ta.

original: sngo zhing ser la de bzhin dmar //
analyzed: sngo zhing ser la de bzhin dmar //
translated: He is blue, yellow, and likewise red,

original: ljang gu dkar po de bzhin te //
analyzed: ljang gu dkar po de bzhin te //
translated: green, and white, likewise.

original: steng gi zhal gdong gdug pa che //
analyzed: steng gi zhal gdong gdug pa che //
translated: The upper face is very wrathful,

original: zas su gdug pa @195b longs spyod cing //
analyzed: zas su gdug pa @195b longs spyod cing //
translated: and he enjoys the enjoyment of wrathful ones.

original: rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas //
translated: He is endowed with the vajra and the bell,🔽and he is the great hero, the lord of heroes.

original: lha mo dag gi nu ma 'tshir //
analyzed: lha mo dag gi nu ma 'tshir //
translated: And the breasts of the goddesses are squeezed.

original: drag po'i pags pa'i gos mnabs shing //
analyzed: drag po'i pags pa'i gos mnabs shing //
translated: They are clad in the skin of a fierce one,

original: khrag rlon 'dzag par ba gsol te //🔽thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
analyzed: khrag rlon 'dzag par ba gsol te // thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
translated: and they wear a garment of fresh blood,🔽holding a skull and a khaṭvāṅga.🔽They hold a spear, a flaying knife, a goad,

original: mdung dang gri gug lcags kyu dang // zhags pa dang ni mgo bo 'dzin //
analyzed: mdung dang gri gug lcags kyu dang // zhags pa dang ni mgo bo 'dzin //
translated: a noose, and a head,🔽fierce and terrifying, with a skull cup and a spear

original: gdug pa gtum zhing cang te'u dang // mdung ni 'bar ba'i phyag rgya can //
analyzed: gdug pa gtum zhing cang te'u dang // mdung ni 'bar ba'i phyag rgya can //
translated: with a blazing mudrā.

original: dpral ba dag tu nye bar mdzes //
analyzed: dpral ba dag tu nye bar mdzes //
translated: They are beautified with forehead ornaments.

original: de lta'i phyag dang sku mdog bzhugs //
analyzed: de lta'i phyag dang sku mdog bzhugs //
translated: They have such hands and bodies.

original: dbu skra grol zhing gcer bu ste //
analyzed: dbu skra grol zhing gcer bu ste //
translated: Their hair is loose and they are naked.

original: 'di lta'i phyag rgya rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: 'di lta'i phyag rgya rnam par bsgom //
translated: One should visualize such a mudrā.

original: dum bu'i ska rags kyis brgyan cing //
analyzed: dum bu'i ska rags kyis brgyan cing //
translated: Adorned with a belt of human bone,🔽one should visualize Vārāhī in this way.

original: phag mo yang ni 'di 'drar bsgom; ;rnal 'byor som nyi spangs nas ni //
analyzed: phag mo yang ni 'di 'drar bsgom; ;rnal 'byor som nyi spangs nas ni //
translated: The yogī, having abandoned doubt,

original: thabs dang shes rab mnyam ldan pas //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab mnyam ldan pas //
translated: through the union of method and wisdom,

original: thugs rje chags pa'i bde ba yis //
analyzed: thugs rje chags pa'i bde ba yis //
translated: with the bliss of compassionate passion,

original: sems can don gyi phyir byung ste //
analyzed: sems can don gyi phyir byung ste //
translated: arises for the sake of sentient beings.

original: snying rje chen pos brlan pa yis //
analyzed: snying rje chen pos brlan pa yis //
translated: With great compassion,

original: nam mkha'i sbyor ba'i longs spyod kyis //
analyzed: nam mkha'i sbyor ba'i longs spyod kyis //
translated: The enjoyment of the union with space

original: thugs rje chen po'i bcud bde bas //
analyzed: thugs rje chen po'i bcud bde bas //
translated: is the bliss of the essence of great compassion.

original: 'gro drug srid pa rnam sbyangs nas //
analyzed: 'gro drug srid pa rnam sbyangs nas //
translated: Having purified the existence of the six beings,

original: sems can de ni mchog nyid mdzad //
analyzed: sems can de ni mchog nyid mdzad //
translated: that sentient being is made supreme.

original: stong pa'i ye shes las byung zhing //
analyzed: stong pa'i ye shes las byung zhing //
translated: Arising from the gnosis of emptiness,

original: rtogs pa med pa'i gnas bzhi la //
analyzed: rtogs pa med pa'i gnas bzhi la //
translated: the four abodes of nonconceptuality

original: rang bzhin med cing mchog tu phra //
analyzed: rang bzhin med cing mchog tu phra //
translated: are essenceless and supremely subtle.

original: thig le sgra ni rnam spangs pa //
analyzed: thig le sgra ni rnam spangs pa //
translated: The bindu is free from sound.🔽Having seen the samaya of equality,

original: mnyam pa'i dam tshig mthong nas ni; ;phyi dang nang gi mchog gyur pa //
analyzed: mnyam pa'i dam tshig mthong nas ni; ;phyi dang nang gi mchog gyur pa //
translated: the supreme outer and inner

original: snying po ye shes dam tshig ni //
analyzed: snying po ye shes dam tshig ni //

original: ma la ba ste /
analyzed: ma la ba ste /

analyzed: phrag pa gnyis su shing grib ma ste / nye ba'i gnas so // k'a ma ru pa ste /

original: ko sa la ste /
analyzed: ko sa la ste /
translated: in the navel.🔽Kosala is Māyūrī,

analyzed: sna rtser chang 'thung ma ste / nye ba'i zhing ngo //

analyzed: sindhu ste / rkang pa'i bol la stobs chen ma ste /

analyzed: chu'i khams ni /

analyzed: dpal he ru ka'o //

analyzed: mig gnyis ni /

analyzed: gti mug rdo rje'o //

analyzed: rna ba gnyis ni /

analyzed: zhe sdang rdo rje'o //

analyzed: sna gnyis ni /

analyzed: ser sna rdo rje'o /

analyzed: kha ni / 'dod chags rdo rje /

analyzed: reg bya ni /

analyzed: phrag dog rdo rje /

original: skye mched thams cad ni /
analyzed: skye mched thams cad ni /

original: dbang phyug rdo rje /
analyzed: dbang phyug rdo rje /

original: yid ni / mi 'khrugs rdo rje /
analyzed: yid ni / mi 'khrugs rdo rje /

original: ngag ni / dpag med rdo rje /
analyzed: ngag ni / dpag med rdo rje /

original: lus ni / rdo rje rnam snang ngo //
analyzed: lus ni / rdo rje rnam snang ngo //

analyzed: 'di dag sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor yin //

original: rang snying lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: rang snying lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis //

original: ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas su //
analyzed: ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas su //

analyzed: de dag sprul cing bkod nas ni //

original: dgyes pas rjes su chags pas sbyor //

original: rang gi ngo bo gcig gyur nas //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo gcig gyur nas //

original: de la go cha gnyis po dgod //
analyzed: de la go cha gnyis po dgod //

analyzed: aom ha snying ga la @199b rdo rje sems dpa'/
